name: Space Hero: Intergalactic Titan
description: A top-down "bullet-heaven" roguelite where you play as a futuristic space marine. Use a variety of damage and utility abilities in your attempt to survive. Earn tokens to spend on permanent character upgrades, ability upgrades, and ability mods that allow you to customize your playstyle.

name: Grippy Golf
description: Grippy Golf is a speedrunning 3D platformer where objects stick to the ball. Launch yourself across the course, collecting an ever-growing cluster of objects as you aim for a hole in one!

name: Years of Division
description: Command the heroes of a land shattered by a war of betrayal. Build up a team of loyal warriors united by common purpose and personal bonds, and shape their growth to suit your strategy. Lead them to victory in turn-based tactical battles to discover the truth behind the Years of Division!

name: Glory or Dominance: The World of Kleiverog
description: Glory or Dominance is a massive online multiplayer roleplay game with a social and competitive nature, where you can dive into an amazing adventure with amazing graphich and huge possibilities, full of action, fantasy, riddles, mysteries, and strong emotions.

name: Mr. Bear's Bizarre Adventure
description: This is a paradise for vr, rhythm and ACT lover. It's also a legend about Mr. Bear.

name: The Willow Man
description: Beware The Willow Man as he lurks throughout the halls, in your dreams, and into your soul. Can you survive the night in this indie 2d horror adventure.

name: Waldenses: In Search of Truth
description: Enzo, a young man raised by his uncle, lives a peaceful life in the Piedmontese Alps, until rumors of a great evil coming from Rome at the behest of Innocent 8th come to light. The boy is involved in a great journey of faith in which friends will help him to try to avoid a terrible massacre.

name: Hifuu OS: Hack Into the Barrier
description: Hifuu OS: Immersive hacking simulator based on the Touhou Project. Play as Renko Usami, learn and use authentic terminal commands to hack into the Great Hakurei Barrier. Unravel the truth behind Maribel Hearn's mysterious coma as you search through Gensokyo's secret and private documents.

name: Entity: Unknown
description: Choose your side in the confrontation between the nightmare spawns and the SSA organization in an asymmetric multiplayer horror game. Spread the miasma of fear, become a real font of horror and plunge the Hunters into a madness, or plunge into an atmosphere of intense horror together with friends.

name: Desperate Island
description: In Desperate Island, the player plays as a survivor on a deserted island and must use the island's resources to survive and cope with the challenges that nature poses to him. The player must search for food and water, create shelters and adaptations to protect himself from natural disasters.

name: Vinterget
description: Brave the mountain in this short platformer. Use your axe as a grappling tool to skillfully swing across multiple challenging levels. Fight through the perils of the snowy mountain of Vinterget.

name: Little Elf Tanks
description: A bombastic bug busting adventure! Play as one of four playable characters in their quest to to free their fellow elves from the clutches of an evil army of spiders. If they crawl, blast em all! Let nothing stand in your way.

name: Metaball
description: Join the ultimate sports league on Hoverboard! In this fast-paced, action-packed sports game based on Basketball, do impressive tricks and goals as you compete in thrilling PvP matches. Collect different currencies and Rank points to unlock equipment and items. Grab your Hoverboard and dominate the court!

name: Little Kingdoms
description: Little Kingdoms is a medieval real time strategy game with stylistic low poly graphics and relaxing music. As a new Lord, you will start with one territory. Your goal is to conquer the neighboring kingdoms and grow your empire.

name: Fae & Fauna
description: Fae & Fauna is an open world pet collecting role-playing game. Collect magical creatures in undiscovered lands and fight with your companions against the dangers lurking in the wilds!

name: Tokyo Waning Moon
description: Tokyo Waning Moon is a two-button survival action in moonlit Tokyo! Slash zombie hordes rushing from left and right - no escape, no retreat! Level up your skills, chase high scores, and conquer time attack challenges!

name: Knock the Bloody Door Down
description: It's hard to be a human in a world of vampires, isn't it? Explore an underground society, uncover its secrets, and make friends along the way. What awaits you on the path ahead - adventure? Or merely more heartache?

name: Forgotten House
description: Try to escape from the old grandfather from his decrepit house by solving riddles. The game is inspired by Gnarled hag

name: Cyber Detective
description: Cyber ​​Detective is an adventure puzzle game. You play as a detective with the ability to shrink your body. Use the Cybergun with three special abilities to solve the case!

name: The Elderseed
description: Embark on an epic action adventure by unraveling the mystery of the Elder Seed and save the world from falling into chaos. Journey with Milo through colorful handcrafted lands, forests, caves and dungeons. Forge new weapons and encounter strange creatures who will help you throughout your journey.

name: The Bridge Curse 2: The Extrication
description: The Bridge Curse 2: The Extrication is part two of The Bridge Curse series. It's a first-person survival horror game where the player controls four characters during Wen Hua University's "Carnival of Horror." What lurks around the corner is foreboding dread, a few laughs, and of course... pure fear.

name: Odinfall
description: Ragnarok was just the beginning… of the end! Odinfall is a Viking-themed, rogue-lite, twin-stick shooter. Blast your way through procedurally generated levels, upgrade your character, modify your weapons and take down robotic Norse gods to earn your freedom!

name: From Ashes, Bloom
description: A minimalist sandbox toy about rewilding Earth by destroying humanity as a mesmerizing alien creature.

name: Return of the Host
description: Return of the Host is a top-down Sokoban-like puzzle game with a twisted storyline and an exciting narrative.

name: MOBA Esport Manager 25
description: Experience what it truly feels like to be a manager of an E-sport team. Create unique ban/pick strategies, manage backroom atmosphere and build your dream team with a calculated scouting process.

name: Shelley's Haunted House
description: Shelley's Haunted House is a 2D Top-Down Survival Horror Game based on the story of the Shelley's house which is a famous haunted location in the US known for the dark spirit of the lady in black.

name: Killmist Enclave
description: Killmist Enclave features randomly generated items and battles with challenging yet simplistic combat. Each battle increases in difficulty, and you'll earn coins and souls to prepare for the next. But be warned: death comes brutally easy.

name: Nightmare of Gemstone
description: Sin descripción

name: Brown Bob
description: Join Brown Bob in his thrilling adventure and help him save his beloved pet!

name: Space Travellers
description: Space Travellers is a unique open-world sandbox space simulator. You have complete freedom of decision and movement. You can travel to familiar places in the Solar System and adjacent systems, or explore over 6000 unexplored distant worlds.

name: Dev_Hell
description: Welcome to Dev_Hell, the dark comedy game about the unrealistic expectations and chaos of the tech industry. Use coding skills to complete poorly-defined features, manage relationships with coworkers, and survive long enough to ship a product that may or may not crash on launch...

name: Start Over
description: Start Over is a thrilling multiplayer survival game that takes you to a deserted island where you must build a base, craft equipment, and defend against waves of enemies. Collaborate with other players to build a thriving community, or become a lone wolf.

name: Virballs
description: Six outlandish planets are overrun with Virballs - viral elemental creatures that consume each other to create exotic hybrids. Clean up this ecological disaster using Virball hybrids as devastating weapons!

name: Misguidead
description: Misguidead is a horror-focused co-op game. Players must work together to survive and solve puzzles while investigating mysteries from different religions.

name: Cube Sumbledore
description: You play as the dwarf Samble. The hero's great curiosity gets him involved in a completely unimaginable and dangerous adventure.

name: Ayla's Dollhouse
description: Ayla's Dollhouse is a psychological game that tells the unfortunate story of Ayla, a girl tormented by the disorder of time, and her own demons.

name: The Void Calls
description: The Void Calls, and you will answer. Explore the mysteries and secrets of Reprieve, a town stitched together from the dark past of its bizarre inhabitants in this horror-filled point-and-click adventure.

name: Street of Secrets
description: A relaxing hidden object game. Explore unusual houses in search of secrets that their owners hide.

name: Crossing Borders
description: Experience the emotional journey of Crossing Borders, a first person narrative-driven game that takes you on a perilous journey to cross a dangerous border. Immerse yourself in a world filled with stunning landscapes and discover the story of a young person's determination to cross the border.

name: Pirate Patrol
description: Manage anti-piracy operations and secure important trade lines. Command your carier and send your fighter pilots on missions. Find and train new officers and pilots, on procedural game universe map. Equip your ship with new weapons and equipment.

name: Last Train Outta' Wormtown
description: Last Train Outta' Wormtown is a chaotic Sandworm vs. Cowboys showdown. The Worm can only detect players touching the sand, like "hot lava" with a giant sandworm twist! Work together, Complete the objectives, and get outta' Wormtown! - Or, play as the Worm and gobble up your friends!

name: Witch Puzzle Rhythm
description: Cute and sexy witches battle it out in a new type of falling puzzle x rhythm action! Drop blocks in rhythm and defeat your opponents by sending them out of the way. A falling puzzle game where it feels great to erase blocks in time with the rhythm!

name: The Backrooms: Investigate and Escape
description: Backrooms: Investigate and Escape is action-survival horror experience. You are at the mercy of the entities lurking and must do whatever it takes to survive while completing each level's objectives. Multiple new levels will be added each month as we develop the true Backrooms experience.

name: Assassins of Darkness
description: After the death of Emperor without an heir, the Eastern Empire disintegrated and fell into turbulent times. Sakura, an elite assassin who betrayed her clan. She sought the power of darkness with the desire to end the civil war and unite all the clans into a new empire under her rule.

name: Glum
description: Take on the role of Glum, a grumpy goblin, fated to save his captured overlord. Arm yourself with a magical boot and become a mean ass-kicking machine as you go on a quest that’s way over your lousy minion paygrade.

name: Cubenomics
description: Cubenomics is a physics puzzle game. Draw lines to guide the ball around a cube using gravity and puzzle mechanics. Activate all buttons to open the exit and bring the ball to the goal to solve each puzzle.

name: Complex Loop
description: Complex Loop is a sci-fi themed visual novel. This is a story of time loops between past and future. Within a time limit of 20 minutes, your mission is to save a mysterious girl died from an explosion accident one year ago. Solve puzzles and reveal the truth behind the tragedy. An adventure awaits!

name: Slidemagi
description: Slidemagi is a magical combat between two mages. Each one will use their deck of cards to cast spells or create warriors that will fight under their control. It is a turn-based strategy game with a unique way of moving on an isometric board, playable by one or two players, locally or remotely.

name: DinoDash
description: DinoDash is an action packed racing game set in a futuristic world where dinosaurs have been reborn as precious gemstones. After surviving extinction they race at high speeds on dangerous tracks to fill their adrenaline. Join this intense experience and see if you can become the DinoDash champion!

name: Cosmic Holidays
description: Help Cibo find his way in an unknown world. Through gorgeous flora and fauna, Cibo can glide in the wind, bounce, propel or block, absorb impacts or roll, using his power to inflate his head. Learn from hostile nature to make it your ally. Earn Cibo's trust until he reaches his vacation resort!

name: Shotgun Knight
description: Embark on an impossible climb with nothing but yourself and a shotgun to propel yourself upwards while falling losing all your progress countless times.

name: Celtique
description: Multiplayer stealth game set in a dream!

name: Brothel Simulator II
description: Brothel Simulator II is a simulation game in which you manage your own brothel. Employ girls, keep track of their needs, level up their skills, keep the bar well stocked and your clients will be back again and again.

name: QR Escape
description: A puzzle-solving mystery based in an art gallery. You will be constructing and scanning imaginatively designed QR codes to solve the mystery.

name: Utter Takedown
description: Utter Takedown is a top-down tactical stealth game set in the 2000s. You have been a hitman for a long time. But after you stopped working with the local mafia, it decided to kidnap your family to get rid of you. Now, your goal is to make utter mafia takedown.

name: Infest
description: Infest is a roguelike deckbuilder where you manipulate the battleground Pixel-by-Pixel. Every pixel is physically simulated to burn, freeze, corrode, shock, and melt. Deploy a carefully-crafted deck to unleash impressive chain reactions on the alien infestation!

name: Re:Touring
description: Re:Touring is a first-person puzzle game in which you'll explore the abandoned Luoni Energy Competence Center and uncover the facility's history, navigating through a total of 26 varied levels. Using a retro-style computer, you'll create color patterns to control elements such as doors, platforms and lasers. Each mechanism is carefully introduced to make the game accessible to everyone.

name: Three Minutes to Eight
description: Three Minutes To Eight is a mind bending pixel art adventure. A gaming experience threading the edge of consciousness, where everything is possible and yet remains elusive.

name: Yokai Hero
description: Yokai Hero will tests your skills. At the same time, the world itself tells a story on its own. Every level feels realistic, and you truly feel the high stakes that your character is dealing with every step of the way. That helps add a lot of excitement, but also challenge to the game as a whole.

name: Tower Song
description: Tower Song is a turn-based JRPG/strategy RPG hybrid. Choose your hero, customize your party's skills and gear, and hone strategies to defeat challenging enemies in this narrative-led adventure.

name: I Can See You
description: Step into the shoes of Azuka in this intense third-person survival horror game. You are nothing but prey, and your only goal is to hide and avoid being caught by your pursuer. You must complete puzzles, explore new areas of the house, and uncover the truth behind the situation through a smartphone.

name: Beast vs. Legends
description: Enter a dark fantasy world filled with magic and adventure in "Beast vs Legends." Assemble an army of legendary heroes and battle fierce beasts to save your homeland. Unleash your magical powers and explore a vast open world filled with hidden treasures and ancient secrets.

name: The Archives
description: You'll explore a post-apocalyptic world that's been ravaged by war and natural disasters. Set in the aftermath of a global economic collapse and escalating tensions between NATO and BRICS, the game takes place several years after a devastating event that has left the world in ruins.

name: Rudra: A Tale of Time
description: Rudra: A Tale of Time is an action RPG inspired by Hindu scriptures. Embark on a journey of self-discovery by unlocking chakras and using mantras to save the universe from the forces of evil. Are you ready to unleash your inner warrior and restore balance to the universe?

name: Boomerang Jack
description: Boomerang Jack is an action-adventure RPG with free-flowing combat. String together boomerang attacks with kinetic movement and upgradeable powers. Embark on a globe-trotting quest to stop the Pirate King.

name: Unsung Ballads
description: In this indie story-driven RPG deck-builder, embark on an exciting adventure of epic proportions, inspired by the rich folklore of south-eastern Europe.

name: Earth's Greatest Defender
description: Shoot aliens in the coolest way possible using classic weapons and your grappling hook!

name: LIP! Lewd Idol Project Vol. 3
description: Kanako arrives on the scene! The third and last part in Lewd Idol Project’s story begins now. Join Kairi, Yuki, and Ranko as they try to find the last piece of the puzzle and make this tsundere rocker girl join the group and finally make their long awaited live debut! IT'S TIME TO ROCK!

name: One Step to Paradise
description: You are about to dive into the adventures of the main hero: pilot-engineer Henry Morgan! The adventure is truly dangerous, but at the same time very passionate and full of love! An intriguing plot with unexpected twists that will leave you craving for more!

name: Portal Guardians
description: Incinerate, cut, gut everyone who wants to get into the portal. Use the full power of your arsenal and traps! Protect the portal by destroying crowds of enemies!

name: The Regions
description: This is a puzzle game about "Region". Manipulate the region to reach the goal state.

name: The Declassifier
description: Uncover The Government's darkest secrets in this action packed top down shooter inspired by 80's action flicks of questionable quality.

name: Escape Space
description: A 2D horizontal shoot’em’up. Purchase various spaceships and weapons. Upgrade them. Customize your loadout. Accept contract missions and defend our solar system against intruders.

name: Rootown
description: Plant trees, spread your roots and explore the underground in this cute and relaxing small-town sim!

name: Realm of Simplicity
description: Realm of Simplicity is a indie-developed MMORPG that will have you embark on your own adventure. Complete quests, master your skills, party-up and conquer dungeons all at your own pace!

name: Tiny Squads
description: Draft a squad of tiny heroes and slay monsters of the Void in this auto-battler rogue-like. Design your own units with an assortment of classes, equipment, skills and unique effects! Merge units to create a monstrous tiny titan!

name: Tiny Terrariums
description: Build terrariums for forest gnomes to live in, and play around in your creations as any one of the gnomes.

name: Reso-Seeker
description: Explore the Resort Hotel! Reso-Seeker is a Metroidvania (side-scrolling puzzle platformer). Explore the pixel art resort hotel, change characters and beat bosses. The more skills you learn, the more places you can go!

name: Flopparena
description: A chaotic mixture of third person, melee fighting, physics-based combat, and lots of enemies. Fight to stand victorious in this tabletop combat game!

name: Erin and the Otherworld
description: In this turn-based casual strategy deckbuilder defeat ancient Celtic monsters as a druid by creating constellations. Power up your altar and learn more rituals to save your homeland.

name: Omi Momi
description: Omi Momi is a simple yet challenging puzzle game.It is the perfect blend of classic 8-bit and 16-bit mechanics, making it a must-play for gamers who appreciate a retro feel

name: Max Massacre
description: A visual novel set in a monster-filled fantasy world.

name: Hat'venture
description: Jumping into a hole may not be the best idea, but your hair has been stolen. Master the powers of hats and get it back.

name: Greed Hunters
description: Earn rewards for your greed in this chaotic, multiplayer rogue-like game. Explore randomly generated dungeons with up to 8 players in a world where greed is the currency. To survive, you must outsmart and out-hoard your teammates.

name: Sprydite
description: Sprydite is an action-adventure, survival with immersive RPG elements in a large open world. Science fiction set in a post-apocalyptic and cyberpunk backwoods setting with a small touch of surrealism.

name: Farm Station
description: Farm Station – Develop and innovate the farm, make repairs, and take care of customer service. Remember that your pets and workers help you. Order and sell a diverse assortment, from seeds to huge harvesters! Watch out for robbers, they take advantage of inattention moment for sure!

name: Climb New York Parkour VR
description: Climb New York VR is a great Climbing game where you can free run. In Climb New York VR, you can freely do everything you want to do in real life, where you can complete the parkour by jumping over the buildings, where you can time travel through portals.

name: RedSpaceOps
description: Experience the thrill of live space operations by controlling various Research, Experimental, and Demonstration (RED) spacecraft to accomplish real world tasking. The first mission is SpaceCowboy ADR (Active Debris Removal). Clean up dangerous debris to earn ADR bucks and refuel to stay alive.

name: Crux
description: Crux is a fast-paced single-player arena shooter roguelike, where you face waves of enemies, unique bossfights and earn powerful magic abilities across 13 arenas. Master your fluid movement, trusty arsenal and the power of the blood gods to reach the top of the CRUX Champions Leaderboard!

name: No.Break Brick
description: Break the bricks and clear your view! This game is a casual game where players break bricks with small balls to penetrate the defense of a beautiful girl and open her heart.

name: Destroy the Monoliths
description: Explore. Mine. Build. Fight. Destroy The Monoliths is a single-player real-time mining tower offense roguelike where you explore a randomly generated map, mine the terrain to get resources, and build turrets to both protect your base and fight monoliths that keep spawning ever more minions.

name: Starship Colony
description: A deep starship colony sim. Build your starship, manage air, water, food, fuel, energy, temperature and psychology to keep your crew alive across vast distances. Closed-loop system in space. Mining, wiring, plumbing, in-ship factory, (alien?) radio signals & translation, diplomacy, combat, and more.

name: Hexfinder
description: You will play a hexfinder in the employ of Queen Charlotte’s Anglican Church, tasked with seeking out the witches and warlocks (colloquially known as hexcrafters) who threaten her fair nation. A story-rich, text-based RPG, Hexfinder is a supernatural alt-historical adventure!

name: Dark Age Dinos
description: Dark Age Dinos is a tactical roguelite. Travel alone or with friends through a medieval world of sword wielding dinosaurs. Strategize your way through short adventures where teamwork is the key to success!

name: Space Prison
description: Survive the galaxy's toughest prison and rise to the top of a space gang! Explore, fight, craft, trade and learn convicts' stories to escape the facility. Space Prison is a turn-based tactical survival game with deep strategy and social RPG elements.

name: Toon Toon Racing
description: Toon Toon Racing is a stylized racing game with pretty cool physics and music. Choose your car and get ready!

name: Alveron: Withering Roots
description: Dive into the magical realm of Lyhjem and help save the World Tree. In "Alveron" you take on the role of Valec, who is drawn from the human world into the world of the Alveri.

name: Big Adventure: Trip to Europe 4 - Collector's Edition
description: Avi Games presents the newest game in the Big Adventure series with Big Adventure: Trip to Europe 4! Packed with challenging hidden-object scenes and clever mini-games, this European holiday offers a vacation experience like no other!

name: Polimines 2
description: Polimines 2 is an elegant puzzle and logic game that brings together mechanics from Nonograms and Minesweeper. All levels are hand-designed so that guessing is never required.

name: Dungeon Mage
description: Dungeon-Crawler with crafting, combat and exploration. Defeat enemies, collect resources, craft or find equipment and explore the dungeon in order to get stronger. Do to not give in when the celestials come for you ...

name: Lavrock: Last Fortress
description: In a world on the brink of destruction, pilot a mech to fight against various factions, battle through random generated levels, strengthen yourself, and uncover the secrets!

name: Super Jigsaw Puzzle: Generations - Random Animals 3
description: Puzzles of random animals!

name: Blood Sunset
description: Blood Sunset is an open-world, post-apocalyptic, survival RPG. You happen to find yourself on old deserted islands... full of zombies. You'll have to survive, kill, run away, get food, and resources.

name: Handwriting Fantasy
description: A Roguelike card game based on Chinese character rules! Cards are designed according to the meaning of the characters. You can composite stronger character cards, and composite words to enhance their skills. Emergence of unconstrained builds, experience endless fun!

name: ItemDay
description: Try to survive in ItemDay, an asymmetric multiplayer hide-and-seek game

name: Cat Engineer: Light On
description: A relaxing puzzle game about connecting cable and light up the world

name: Inside a Dungeon
description: What will you find inside a dungeon? A treasure chest filled with gold and traps, a battle against the dangerous forces and greedy desires of humanity, or a place full of misery waiting for your demise.

name: Game of Rollink
description: Game of Rollink is a PvP card game with auto-battler, where you play as a medieval lord to outwit sinister opponents on the gaming table and seize the supreme throne. Bet wisely because gold and countless lives of loyal soldiers are at stake. Make your best hand and may the odds be in your favor.

name: Instance Destroy
description: Bite sized metroidvania with several unique mechanics Make weapons from the elements, juggle enemies, find furniture? fight bosses, unlock abilities, find secrets, unlock transformations!

name: Anant Shrankhla
description: Anant Shrankhla is a first-person adventure game about a protagonist who falls into an unending journey through mysterious Indian landmarks and learns about the true purpose of his life.

name: Young Mage
description: Skeletons are attacking nearby castle, catch them through the portal and assign to mine ore in your tower! Use collected materials to defend the castle and Craft better equipment for your workers! Help villagers to unveil evil behind the skeletons ambush!

name: Behind the Frame: The Finest Scenery VR
description: The serene, heartwrenching tale re-imagined for VR! Guide brush strokes and solve a variety of puzzles to help an aspiring artist complete her masterpiece. As her painting starts to take shape, learn more about her brusque neighbor, pesky cat, and mysterious past!

name: Dark Age Legends: Necromancer's Bane
description: The necromancer has brought the dark age to the world, and the realm's mightiest champions embark on a journey to defeat him and become legends. Build your team right, craft items, hone your skills, and bring an end to the dark age.

name: CD 2: Trap Master
description: 3D tower defense + roguelike deckbuilding: Craft a deck, lay out traps, ward off enemies, and navigate through the map until you confront the boss! Make use of a variety of funny & creative traps to shoot, stab and scorch enemies and guard the peace of the universe!

name: SokoSolitaire
description: SokoSolitaire is a card-pushing puzzle game inspired by Sokoban and Solitaire. You'll find yourself pushing, stacking or flipping cards and more across 60 different handcrafted levels.

name: Almost
description: Get ready for an adrenaline-fueled ride with a first-person speedrun game that demands lightning-fast decision-making skills. Are you prepared to push your abilities to the limit and achieve the almost perfect run?

name: Riftstorm
description: Fight a relentless battle against cosmic horrors as an elite secret operative. Riftstorm is a Multiplayer Roguelite Shooter featuring unique weapon skills, challenging dungeons, and high replayability for solo and up to 3 players co-op.

name: Princess Survivors
description: A roguelike action game in which beautiful girls fight against hordes of hordes to reclaim their castle. Strengthen her skills during the battle or enhance them in a shop. Become stronger and defeat their enemies.

name: Hired: Assassin Simulator
description: Get Ready to be a Hired Killer. Money talks! Get the killing job from mysterious people all over the world, do your preparation and make it done in different ways. Get your money transferred in your bank account and upgrade your killing equipment and base!

name: Jeff: The Hungry Fish
description: Jeff: The Hungry Fish is a single-player mode, aquatic themed arcade-style game where you play as a hungry little fish. Prey on other fishes or be preyed on instead. Evade predators as you dine until you can eat the predators themselves. Rise above the food chain and become the apex predator!

name: Tales of the Vagabond
description: Fight, hunt, gather, fish, buy and sell weapons and equipment in this sandbox classical fantasy world. Take on dynamic quests for money or take sides in a larger conflict or seek out the dark lord. Your fate is as you choose it.

name: Atmosfar
description: Atmosfar is a sky-high odyssey set on an alien planet of floating islands explored by flying crafts and a mobile airbase as you uncover the fate of your collapsed colony.

name: CheckMaze
description: CheckMaze brings chess and mazes together and introduces new pieces and mechanics to the classic game of chess. Maneuver your way through a series of mazes filled with portals and traps and more, while utilizing the unique abilities of new pieces to solve tens of handcrafted puzzles.

name: Red Lands
description: Prepare for a voyage through the wild and colorful countries of the Red Lands. Build new railroads and towns across forests and ruins. Classic RPG with elements of city builder genre.

name: Ropu Barastu No X
description: Blast bullet hell baddies to build up combo, pull out your Ropu Barastu Beam and make panties drop. Impress these girls with score to score. What are you waiting for? Worried you wont have a big enough score?

name: Dragon Courier
description: Explore a vast world filled with monsters where deliveries are to be made!

name: Future Breach 64
description: Breach and Clear areas tactically in a team-based shooter.

name: Super VHS
description: Explore Milwaukee's most famous bad movie warehouse! Collect over 50 VHS tapes, spin the Wheel of the Worst, and play Plinketto!

name: Arkem
description: Arkem is a genre mashup historic game set in Medieval Times, where strategic building and third-person action RPG combine to form a seamless, fascinating experience.

name: Kithack Model Club
description: Developed by the creator of Kerbal Space Program, Kithack Model Club provides boundless freedom to design, build, explore and battle with model RC vehicles. Experience realistic physics combined with limitless customization options and the ability to share your models with friends!

name: Borderwatch: Dark Armada
description: As a part of the Borderwatch team, scavenge, defend and survive against zombie hordes in this 3rd person action horror survival! Will you be able to see the daylight?

name: Stardome
description: You have only one mission in the Stardome: To get back home! As the darkness rises, so too does the threat of danger. Flesh-hungry, nightmarish creatures will come for you. Immerse yourself in a first-person action survival game, where resource management is key to your survival.

name: Novastride
description: Soar through and conquer the galaxy in Novastride. Lead your battalions in aerial and ground fights with real-time tactics, or join your comrades in high-action dogfights and ground battles. Dominate your enemies throughout the universe and explore the deep story waiting to be uncovered.

name: Twin Stick Tennis
description: A new way to play digital tennis. Play by manually controlling your player and racket! With only yourself to blame, will you be able to master the ball? Train and dominate the court. Play epic matches against friends, or start a career and become the next big smack champion!

name: Wisp Catacombs
description: Wisp Catacombs is a creative top-down roguelike - play as Wisps, solo or with friends, and use their powers to explore worlds, defeat bosses, and uncover the mystery of your creator to fix everything in this chaotic universe...

name: StormEdge: Wind of Change
description: Discover the origins of the Elemental Tempests in the StormEdge: Wind of Change, the prequel to the main game, StormEdge. Uncover the cause of the magical disturbance in the world.

name: Nuclear Frost
description: Nuclear Frost is an action-adventure first-person shooter where you have to face the threats that the new world has brought to bear. Fight mutants, keep yourself warm, avoid radiation and fight fungus to save your home.

name: Mini Sports
description: Mini Sports is an online game with various 1vs1 mini-games, including billiards, racing, badminton, curling, mini golf, and archery. Play against players from all over the world or invite your friends to compete against you and find out who's the better player.

name: Robin Morningwood Adventure: Attack of the Gay Clones
description: Welcome to the "Happy Ending"! A park located on a tropical island where men, orcs, but also woofians like to come to relax... Or at least they used to.

name: Rekt 2
description: What if your car was a skateboard?! Play with up to 16 players and jump, grind and kickflip your car as you try not to get Rekt! Unlock over 50 cars and customize them into the perfect stunt car.

name: Liam_99
description: Liam_99 tells the story of a little skeleton, amnesic but aware of being the central character in a video game, off on a journey of self-discovery through a vast afterworld. Embark with your favorite protagonist (soon enough) on a humorous yet poetic adventure!

name: Labyrinth of Axarith
description: Players make adventurers and challenge numerous labyrinths, and mix good old 3D exploration dungeons, real-time battles, and card-like choices in this RPG.

name: StackHoops
description: A casual multiplayer basketball-like game. Play against your friends, random matchmaking, or against the computer. Customize your ball, court, and more to showoff to the world and win in style. Complete challenges and prove your skills!

name: Toroidal: Awaiting the Spring
description: Sin descripción

name: 1630: The Thirty Years' War
description: 1630: The Thirty Years' War is a thrilling and immersive real-time strategy game. Experience one of the most tumultuous periods in European history, using your strategic skills to navigate the complex political landscape of the time and making key decisions that will determine the war's outcome.

name: Tyrium: Dawn of a New Era
description: In Tyrium you build a base, collect Tyrium minerals with collector units and convert it to credits in a refinery. Build an army of tanks, rocket launchers, aircraft and infantry units to attack the enemy base and secure map control. Win by destroying the enemy headquarters or all enemy units.

name: Rome: The Mystery of the Chronovisor
description: Solve the mystery of the enigmatic time machine! In this Hidden Object Adventure game you will go for a walk around Rome to search for the secret of the Chronovisor and save the heroes who have fallen into a trap. You will make unbelievable discoveries on your way!

name: Dynopunk: Welcome to Synth-City
description: An ironic adventure with cyberpunk aesthetics set in a world where humans have been replaced by dinosaurs. Become a top-notch repair shop mechanic: fix gadgets, have heart-to-heart talks, and offer drinks to your customers — everything to fulfill your ultimate dream.

name: Scott Whiskers in: The Search for Mr. Fumbleclaw
description: A funny Point & Click adventure for all ages, in the spirit of the classics of the genre

name: Saiko no Sutoka no Shiki
description: Saiko no Sutoka Halloween Edition is a spin-off of the original game Saiko no Sutoka, in which Saiko is a zombie anime girl who wants to play with her senpai, with the senpai needing to complete her parts and give her food to satisfy her hunger while simultaneously trying to escape.

name: Ice Flame
description: Ice Flame - an exciting game about the adventures of an incredible cat who travels in search of magical fire through an icy mountain. However, on the way to his goal, he will have to overcome many traps and overcome various obstacles on his difficult path!

name: Bytes: The Reverse Tower Defense
description: Bytes: The Reverse Tower Defense is a twist on the classic Tower Defense formula. Build your own path to the exit and use special tiles to keep your Bytes safe against a dynamic AI that tries to counter your actions.

name: Back to the Collis
description: Back to the Collis is a story-rich, fully hand-drawn 2D Point & Click adventure puzzle. Embark on a journey alongside the main character, Benjamin, to solve lots of engaging puzzles and explore the town of Collis, outstanding by its memorable populace.

name: Revenge of the Shadow Ninja
description: Platform game with a gloomy artistic style. Challenging levels with many traps and enemies. Use all your skills to avoid dangerous traps. Destroy all opponents on your way to revenge.

name: War Shore
description: A tower defense game that will bring challenge and many hours of fun. Get ready for battle in this amazing naval-themed game.

name: RedStory and the Last Glimmer
description: RedStory and the Last Glimmer tells the story of Red, Little Red Riding Hood, accompanied by Birdy, a little bird, in the fantastic world of the 6 Kingdoms. An adventure full of action and humor with stunning graphics, !!

name: TetraMage
description: A retro fantasy action/puzzle roguelite

name: The Mountaineers
description: The Mountaineers is a climbing platformer set in a wholesome universe. It’s an arcade game with the objective to climb as high as possible despite various obstacles. As you progress you can get rid of your rental shoes, earn your way to go shirtless and buy proper equipment.

name: Fantasy Survival in Another World
description: "Fantasy Survival in Another World" is a role-playing game with Japanese-style fantasy elements, combining survival, ARPG, and building mechanics. Explore every corner of the map, discover new locations and quests, and collect various resources and treasures.

name: Akhra: The Treasures
description: Go on a journey into the fantastic world of Akhra! Construct and use the ancient, powerful artifacts in order to find all of the hidden treasures. Earn powerful skills you can use to solve the puzzles. Enjoy the peaceful music and relaxing atmosphere in this phantastic Match-3 game.

name: Last Stance: A JuVentures Game
description: Fight your way through endless waves of enemies in this fast paced 3-button punch game.

name: Philotes Trials
description: The Philotes Trials is a competition that exists to bring harmony to the world. Every year, different species are randomly selected and grouped together to participate in these trials. Even if they dislike each other, they have to form a bond and build teamwork in order to pass.

name: Roll It to the End
description: Roll It to the End is an addictive puzzle game where the objective is to reach the end by matching the number at the bottom of the dice with the number from the end point. Special platforms will trigger different events. With the builder you can create and share your own levels with other players.

name: Magic Pussy: Chapter 1
description: Magic Pussy: Chapter 1 is an adult Visual Novel About the priggishness of a young student of Magic university.This is a story about a magical university where the main character is transferring to.

name: SCP Operations
description: In SCP Operations, tactical gameplay and strategic thinking are your greatest assets. Lead your team of four specialized agents through intense, turn-based combat scenarios. Customize and develop your squad by allocating talent points to enhance their abilities, choosing the perfect weapons, and equipping them for success. As you progress, you'll face off against the Chaos Insurgency, a formidable enemy bent on undermining the Foundation. Engage in meticulously planned battles against both human adversaries and a host of bizarre SCP entities, each with unique abilities and challenges.

name: Kill the Cute
description: Kill the Cute is a fast-paced Action Roguelite with 20+ unique characters and a lot of challenging maps. Choose the best character that suits you, capture their souls, discover the most powerful skill builds, upgrade your weapons and Kill The Cute!

name: Hexoria
description: Harness the power of magical cards and become a master strategist in Hexoria, a turn-based roguelike deckbuilder game. Explore a dangerous world, build and expand your village, gather resources, and use your cards to gain obedience. Survive the unknown and lead your cult to glory!

name: Flock of the Low God VR
description: This combat-based survival horror VR game immerses you in the terrifying world of the feature film MALUM as you attempt to survive the last shift in a decommissioned police station while fighting off a violent cult & their demonic creatures. Play Single Player or Co-Op VR & prepare for Hell!

name: Bad Dream: Purgatory
description: Explore a hauntingly surreal landscape filled with unused characters from a cancelled project in Bad Dream: Purgatory. Will you give them purpose, or will they be doomed to suffer?

name: Under Dead
description: The dead have risen and the living have been forced to take refuge in underground bunkers. Take the role of a hero who fights the undead and saves survivors.

name: The Paracelsian Project
description: You awaken in an unfamiliar location with unfamiliar people and are surrounded by mystery. Will you be able to solve the puzzle and uncover why you are here in this sci-fi/mystery/puzzle visual novel? The future hangs in the balance.

name: Gifted Island
description: The main character, Ronnie, visits his home island to claim his inheritance after receiving news of his grandmother's death. He is confronted by two ghosts and two men and women who are after his inheritance. Will he be able to inherit safely, and what are their true intentions?

name: Midnight Heaven
description: Survive a midnight duty on mars by fighting off invading native creatures. Midnight Heaven is a hack N slash roguelike with randomly generated arena. Choose from variety of avatar and weapon and make your own builld to survive.

name: Crisis Island
description: Crisis Island is a fast paced, top down, pixel art, twin-stick shooter that takes inspiration from Time Crisis, Shock Troopers, and 80s action movies!

name: TouHou: Legend of Fairy Souls
description: “TouHou: Legend of Fairy Souls” is a TouHou fan game.In the game, because of someone's conspiracy, Reimu turned into Kedama and caused her power to weaken.Reimu then had to embark on an adventure to recover herself and finally uncover who was behind the scenes.

name: Eras Rising
description: In Eras Rising, follow a party of warriors as they journey to uncover why strange beasts have suddenly begun invading their homeland. Manipulate the enemy position and use terrain to your advantage to fend off the beasts in turn-based tactical combat!

name: Spaceship Survivors
description: Spaceship survivors is an anime style arena survivor roguelike, where you play in the space to fight against loads of alien spaceships. Create unique builds to survive and kill the final boss or go for an endless run. You can unlock 33 playable spaceships.

name: Plague: London 1665
description: Plague: London 1665 is an RPG with pixel art graphics set in 1665's during the Bubonic Plague outbreak in overcrowded and polluted London. As a body collector, graveyard keeper, and family provider, avoid the disease while clearing the streets. Will you survive the outbreak or become another victim?

name: Diebrary
description: Enter the Diebrary! Test your reflexes and wit in this fast-paced arena roguelike, where you must fight through thousands of enemies to make it out alive. Choose upgrades and power-ups to increase your chances of survival, then vote on new twists to spice up your next run!

name: UDO
description: UDO is a delicious arcade down-scroller roguelike where you dig into a creepy hole with an oversized drill!

name: Land of Tales
description: Land of Tales is an atmospheric 3D platformer with typing mechanics in which you play as Kya, a young girl who is teleported to a world where story books are scattered throughout. As Kya explores and progresses through the world, she will discover the reason for her presence there.

name: King's Recycle
description: Clean up the planet, dodge meteors, and uncover ancient secrets in this action-adventure game! Customize your raccoon king with new abilities and compete or cooperate with others in multiplayer. Explore a vast and beautiful world filled with danger and mystery, and join the fight to save the planet!

name: Beyond the Lens
description: Capture surreal AI-generated photos exploring a strange environment with your camera in this relaxing, experiential art-game.

name: Disk Dashers
description: Plan trajectories, distribute energy, and outsmart your opponents in this simple but deep physics strategy game. Adapt to unusual environments and threats in singleplayer, or compete against opponents in strategic multiplayer.

name: Forging Ahead
description: Craft weapons and armor using fun physics, run your own shop, hire adventurers, level up your reputation, and more. With multiplayer options and endless possibilities, this game is perfect for you whether you are a casual gamer or want to grind out all the possibilities!

name: Cards We're Dealt
description: Wander haunted halls as an office temp and collect magical cards with supernatural abilities to fight demons and save the office from being dragged to hell in this horror, deckbuilding, roguelike game.

name: Hold the Door
description: Hold the Door is a 2d pixel-art tower defence game where you influence the monsters paths by placing your towers strategically. With procedurally generated levels & waves, it's guaranteed to always provide a new experience every time you play.

name: Ultra Mega Planet Battles
description: Ultra Mega Planet Battles (UMPB) is an intense arcade-style, space-based, top-down, twin-stick shooter. Players can play by themselves, or with up to 3 friends local co-op or Steam Remote Play (total of 4 players). Select your character, select and modify your ship, then get shooting!

name: Spaceship Racer: Portal
description: Spaceship Racer: Portal is an acade retro endless runner in pixel style with crazy "spaceships"

name: Lilith Wants to Buy Your Soul
description: Take a personality test with a definitely-not-clingy demon girl.

name: Kuroinu Redux
description: Desperate to end a bloody war, the Seven Shields Alliance—led by an elven goddess incarnate—seek out the assistance of the protagonist Vult and his Black Dog Mercenaries. He turns on them them and takes control in this visual novel story of betrayal.

name: Floor Chess
description: Training software to improve your chess. You can do tactics, calculus, capture and analyze FENs, learn principles, openings and more!

name: A Lost Note
description: Follow the journey of a curious cat as it explores a range of different environments that were once the backdrop for a moving and emotional love story.

name: Sculpture of Chance
description: A roguelike deckbuilding adventure where you hack and tinker with a mysterious slot machine. Build a unique deck of your favorite symbols, use powerful tools to manipulate the spin outcomes and collect precious loot! Give it a spin and build the most magnificent Sculpture of Chance!

name: Survival & Horror: The Damned City
description: Survival & Horror: The Damned City tells the story of a cursed city where you'll have to face various enemies and bosses, each requiring a unique approach and knowledge of their weaknesses. Your father has disappeared, and you have come to this city to find him.

name: Lost Surreal Hell
description: A Turn Based RPG, where you collect elements, and evolve your attacks, but if you wander too far off the path, you may end up stuck in a strange surreal hell full of disjointed worlds full of surreal comedy shows, brainwashing, a strange company running a dying MMO in the backrooms and a dark truth.

name: The Great Smog
description: The Great Smog is a Co-Op Steampunk Horror that blends the group scares of Horror Hunters with the player-driven gameplay of Immersive Sims. Descend from your fully customizable airship to scavenge resources from an alt-history London and take on monsters inspired by British myths.

name: Inner Blade
description: This is a speed-focused action-adventure game. You will play as a inner ninja, entering your partner's dreams and collecting powers and ninjutsu within a limited time frame, defeating enemies in the dream world, and saving your partner's soul.

name: Knockout 2: Wrath of the Karen
description: In America, all disagreements are solved through boxing. Tour the nation - and the world - exacting revenge on everyone who ever wronged you in this Punch-Out-inspired rhythm boxing game.

name: Snaker 64
description: A Binding of Isaac-Like, Mystery Dungeon Game with SNKRX controls

name: Guild Saga: Vanished Worlds
description: As a newcomer to the Heroes Guild, you were inexplicably chosen for a mission of grave importance, much to the chagrin of your seniors. Unravel the mystery as you make your way towards the Andra, an unchartered continent in the west brimming with danger and opportunity.

name: Vampire Hunters
description: Create absurd builds by stacking up weapons and raining down crazy firepower on vampires and demons in this rogue-lite retro FPS. Can you be known as the most outrageous Vampire Hunter in all of Transylvania?

name: Gunship
description: Really short game of Gunship. Experience the thrill of being part of a powerful military aircraft in Gunship. With advanced weapons and technology at your disposal, take down enemy targets.

name: Gold Rush
description: Gold Rush - is the simplest 2D game in which you have to overcome various traps and look for treasures.

name: Magia Story
description: Magia Story is a single-player monster taming RPG game. Play in a fun, vibrant world filled with powerful creatures with their own personalty and habits. Learn to be friends or rivals with energetic characters. Battle with creatures and go new places with your pets while exploring lands and towns.

name: Snap Quest
description: A wholesome adventure and exploration game. Help your grandmother recover her lost research on Star Island.

name: Inescapable: No Rules, No Rescue
description: Inescapable is a social thriller set in a tropical island resort: you’ve been kidnapped and forced to participate in a twisted reality TV show with 10 strangers. At the end of their stay, they’ll each receive $500,000... If they survive.

name: Get Your Tentacles Off My Waifu
description: Tentacle monsters have taken pony waifus hostage. It's your job to save them all through extreme violence, achieve pony zen, do Stardust responsibly, and don't think about the meaning of one guy’s war against the universe. Or why cats. This is an accessible cute 'em up after all!

name: Folk Emerging
description: Lead nomadic families through the Stone Age in this turn-based 4X strategy game with deeply simulated characters, cultures, and ecosystems. Explore the wilderness, gather and trade resources, and stand your ground in tactical combat. Discover fire, medicine, language—and survive to tell the tale.

name: Curse of the Draugr Kings
description: What awaits you in the depths of this ancient tomb? Get ready to explore and discover the secrets of the dungeon of the draugr kings.

name: Cat Needs
description: Cats are adorable beings but they can be temperamental, some like one thing and some like another. Find the purrfect way to organize the cats so that everyone is happy. Be careful for them don't fight each other.... or eat each other's food by mistake. ΦωΦ

name: Lore: Curse of the Elemental
description: Play as an adventurer, along side your companion, and uncover a dark secret within the most haunted castle in Ireland. This is a third person mystery adventure and the first installment of a larger series.

name: Big Fat Battle
description: Team up for a battle of epic proportions in this fast paced PvP third-person shooter. A host of ridiculous characters, outrageous weapons and potent powerups await you and your friends.

name: VR Fishtank
description: VR Fishtank is a relaxing VR game in which players can unlock over 70+ aquatic creatures to create their dream fish tank, and swim with the fishes.Built from the ground up for VR.

name: Mocaverse
description: Mocaverse is a motion game driven by our innovative full-body 3D motion engine. The game is fully controlled by your body movements which are captured by your iPhone! Come on! Explore this alien planet with us just like in the movie 'Avatar'!

name: Appearances
description: A Single-player, first-person horror game. Little Suzy finds herself alone in the family villa, but something lurks in the surroundings and seems to have made Suzy his prey… Is it real or just her imagination? Unravel the hidden secrets in order to understand the truth behind your torments.

name: The Chalk
description: Descend into abandoned gold mine filled with danger. Compete with others for gold, but beware of the lurking monster and water flooding the floors. Use chalk marks to navigate, and customize your character to suit your style. Survive and escape with your riches intact.

name: Confabulation: Homestead
description: Horror puzzle game with spot-the-difference elements for survival. Complete interesting puzzles throughout your home to gain access to more areas and unlock more of the story all while using your modified camera to survive the threat that is lurking.

name: Seeb Defender
description: Experience realistic plant growth as you fight off waves of enemies with genetically upgraded weaponized plants. Customize your arsenal and conquer the garden in this unique tower defense rougelike

name: The Gentle Art of Slaughter
description: Kill all the cultists before midnight strikes

name: Ethereal: New Moon
description: Take on the role of Valerie Alton, a young shut-in revitalized by a desire to find her presumed-dead father. With the help of her ghostly caregiver Theria, make friends and face dangerous spirits lurking in the world's every corner in this cinematic point-and-click experience.

name: The Secret of Varonis
description: An indie Gameboy-style RPG. Build a party from four unique races and unravel the mystery of Varonis through challenging old-school turn-based combat.

name: Runic: Eternal Sunrise
description: Travel alongside a cast of Celestials as you complete puzzles, defeat bosses, and unravel the mystery of the Eternal Sunrise in this Match-3 puzzle adventure.

name: MechaWing Adventure
description: Is this a 2D platformer, or a 3D platformer? It's both! Flip from 2D to 3D at your leisure to explore and platform your way across a multitude of levels, some of which include mind-bending puzzles. With unique powerups and a geometric artstyle, this adventure is sure to be super!

name: Orbital Patrol
description: Implementation of planetary and space battles in 2D side-scrolling shooter mechanics. The story of Lieutenant Lani Goodspeed about fighting a mechanoid race of alien invaders.

name: Forgive Me Father 2
description: Embark on a journey into the darkest nightmares to restore your sanity. Blast your way through hordes of possessed enemies, unlock an arsenal of deadly weapons and get ready to face even more Lovecraftian madness in this action-packed FPS sequel.

name: Farm and Fix Simulator
description: Farm&Fix Simulator it's a new farming simulator with three main unique features: - Fix & Service Farm Machines & Vehicles - Fix & Renovate Farm Buildings - Farm & Harvest crops Buy old, destroyed farm and restore it and resell it for a profit.

name: Dream of Tiny Snow
description:
Love and death are the everlasting themes for human beings. If a catalyst called "science" is added, what will happen?

This is a trilogy of short science fiction visual novels in the anti-utopian genre, consisting of "Dream Ending", "Epiphyllum in Love" and "Tiny Snow".

name: Uayeb: The Dry Land - Episode 1
description: You as Uayeb, will explore and survive in a hostile environment, you will find clues helped by your friend archeologist Joanna, to discover Mayan artifacts that will lead you to the lost civilization, you will craft your equipment to be ready for the adventure.

name: Flipper Mechanic Simulator
description: Flipper Mechanic is a repair simulator for retro entertainment devices such as flippers, arcade and coin-op machines. The player will buy at online auctions old devices destroyed and forgotten by the world.

name: Evil Dead: The Game - Game of the Year Edition
description: Step into the shoes of Ash Williams or his friends from the iconic Evil Dead franchise and work together in a game loaded with over-the-top co-op and PVP multiplayer action!

name: Bloxs
description: Bloxs is a 3rd person 3D platformer game where your goal is to collect as many coins as possible to win a house.

name: Sir Whoopass & Switchball HD Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: Strayed Lights: Deluxe Edition
description: Explore a dark and oneiric world of rampant nature and corrupted cities. Embody a tiny being of light on its path towards awakening. Fight your inner demons and restore your balance.

name: Melon Journey Pocket
description:
Melon Journey Pocket is a re/demake of the classic adventure released back in 2012, this time playable on your Game Boy!

Melon Journey in your Pocket~!

name: Hover Rider
description: Sin descripción

name: Fishes and Barrels
description:
Fishes and Barrels is an arcade game that requires strategy and a quick pair of thumbs!
Match the correct barrel to the correct fish or boom, it’s game over. Keep your eyes peeled for dang ol' Fish Monsters. They're itching to screw you up! Compete against your friends to see who can catch the most fish using Game Center leaderboards.

name: Basketball Showdown: Royale
description: 50 players meet on one court. Grab your ball and shoot like your life depends on it in Basketball Showdown: Royale!

name: Super Over!
description: Hey all you Cricket fans out there, you are about to experience an entirely unique cricket game!

name: Hockey Blitz
description: Ultrafast sports arcade app. Get your team to the gold. Can you become a champion your nation needs? The World hockey championship in your hands. Play with one of 66 nations and bring the gold to your home.

name: Football Saga Fantasista
description:
Build your professional football career in Fantasista, a social football simulation game where you can be the godlike footballer in the field. Create your character, train hard, join the professional club with your friends and bring your club to be the champion.

In Fantasista you will feel the social competitive spirit at online simulation league. Join a team based on your favorite city with other players to build the best and most united team to conquer the world’s top football league & cup.

name: Hockey Agent
description: “Show me the money!” In this innovative hockey management sim, you are an up and coming agent. Can you negotiate with GMs to get good contracts for your players? Do you have what it takes to handle a stable of ego-driven young hockey players and shape their careers? Can you get them drafted and playing in the NHL? If you think you can make money in the murky world of modern sports, leave your morals at the door and step this way…

name: Laser Cat Craft
description:
Do you love cats?
So help these kittens in their amazing adventure in the wild, crossing bridges, facing laser cat craft monsters!
Don't forget to collect coins to unlock new craft cats!
If you love pets and animals you will enjoy this game.
Play the game now and have fun!

name: Desertopia
description: Desertopia is a relaxing and therapeutic idle simulator that allows you to spend 5 to 10 minutes of your day cultivating a desert island into a vibrant and lively place at your own pace. You are here to care for the island and restore its wildlife. Occasionally you need to pick up floating trash to keep the environment clean. You must also make decisions about events triggered by humans. Do you let a tour group onto the island? Should you build a resort? Every decision will directly affect the development of the island.

name: Shapy Road
description: Come and have fun for free with this amazing endless runner! Chase after the highscore your friends put on and beat them in the best time waster game. Do you have what it takes to run as long as the top player? It’s not super easy to be the best, but we believe in you! Start running and racing now. It’s time to go for gold!

name: Tennis Slam: Global Duel Arena
description:
Enter the Arena! From the creators of Ultimate Tennis comes a new strategic tennis game! Collect and upgrade dozens of Skills and Players to defeat your opponents and win Trophies, Stars and infinite glory in the Arena. Find the best Skill that suits your Player and build a strong team against the opponent based on the player types!
Use strategies to lead your tennis team to victory!

name: Pine Racer
description: Pine Racer is probably the hardest arcade racing game on App Store to master! Race down the narrow endless track in this fast & fun car physics game, but don't fall off! Jump over obstacles, collect power ups and go through check points to beat your high score. Super fast pace and fluid controls, and it gets harder the more points you get!

name: Pedal Up!
description: Hang on tight - Pedal Up! takes you out to some awesome riding spots to hone your skills in the sport of bike trials. Use your balance, technique, skill and timing to get through tons of sections. The whole point of trials is to get over and around anything without putting your feet down. Do you have what it takes?

name: Sleigher
description:
Smash through mountain roads, ice lakes, ski resorts & towns as you guide your dogs using super easy controls.

Gain bonuses for high-speed runs, air time or generally causing chaos along the way!
Your rival skiers will not approve, but they are no match for your husky team! Can you show 'em who's boss before they get the better of you?

name: Tvinnr
description: Swipe and feel the flow. Tvinnr is an intelligent puzzle game with simple and elegant design. Though challenging, Tvinnr has a relaxing flow of play. Since you can interrupt and continue the game at any time, Tvinnr is truly the perfect casual game.

name: CookieRoute
description:
This stunning puzzle adventure will leave you craving for more and more as you go through the stages, the addiction and intensity to clear the stages while completing the missions is so overwhelming.

Connect the falling down cookies in a correct order to make a perfect route to get that mesmerizing stage clear feelings. connect the cookies wisely to keep up with the falling pace and direction of cookies which differs for every individual stage or cookie respectively, there are number of hurdles and stunts throughout the stages to keep you surprised and focused, be ready to get bestowed with valuable diamonds, rankings and many other useful goodies.

Each stage is designed meticulously with certain missions that require to be fulfilled for a perfect stage clearance, a unique touch has given to this jaw-dropping game where you can bake your favorite cookies with huge range of ingredients that can be earned upon stage clearance.

name: Egg Fighters
description: Earn your wings as a World War I & II flying Ace in Egg Fighters! Immerse yourself in WWII combat and the dawn of aerial warfare as you pilot revolutionary lovely flying machines. Take-off solo in survival mode, or take to the skies online with up to 4 players in real-time multiplayer.

name: Chase the Sun 3D
description: Yes, what you saw is right!! It's a high speed chase to keep up with the sun.

name: Man on Wire
description:
Why Luke is walking in sky?
Why Pirate afraid box?
Why Mummy hate electrodes?
Come to Man on wire, you will know all of them!
Left Left Right, Right Right Left, tap the screen to keep balance. Jump over the electrodes, slide walk through boxes. It’s endless, grappling fun — but don’t touch the electrodes or boxes! And be careful of wind!
Come on! Be the king on wire!
Share your score to Facebook and Twitter!

name: Huge Football
description: You are a tiny football player. While the world is huge. You must challenge giant football players and take their cup.

name: Lich Defense 2
description:
A solid TowerDefense game with a hook!
Be the Lich king and manage your deadly towers and cast devastating magic in this incredibly addictive real-time strategy tower type defense game!
Enjoy large-scale spectacular battles!

name: Project Dark
description: Project Dark is a narrative-driven, immersive audio game that draws on the classic “choose your own adventure” genre to create a unique and compelling interactive experience. The game’s impactful choices and its sophisticated binaural audio allow players to become so immersed in the experience that they can play with their eyes closed.

name: Swords & Bones: Premium Edition
description:
Grab the sword and defend the Kingdom of Vestus in an adventure full of action in the spirit of classic retro games.

The Premium Edition includes:
- Over 50 levels full of action
- 16-bit style visuals
- Power-ups to collect
- Cool bosses to defeat
- Atmospheric chiptune music
- Two endings to discover
- 2 DLCs: the Valor and the Spooky Skin.

name: Mixx Island: Remix Plus
description: Mixx Island Remix Plus is a high-energy, action-packed shooter set in a fantastic 2D world. Gather your wits, sharpen your reflexes, and prepare for the ultimate challenge.

name: Match Three Pack
description: Two great Match three adventures in one fantastic bundle!

name: Connect Dots Puzzle: Classic Casual Arcade
description: Connect the dots in classic dot to dot puzzle with gems and fruits!

name: Pixel Game Maker Series: Tentacled Terrors Tyrannize Terra!
description: Stop the wild machinations of the Neo-Humanoids!

name: Prof. Miyamoto's Soroban & Flash Anzan
description:
Soroban & Flash Anzan is a popular lesson to improve "non-cognitive ability"!
Let's continue practicing "Flash Anzan" every day, which is the most efficient way to improve your abacus-style "anzan" skills!

name: Hush Hush
description: A Visual Novel with a twist - improve skills, charm girls, and learn dangerous secrets... by any means necessary.

name: Inkighter
description: A 2.5D side-scrolling fighting game based on Chinese mythology. With core mechanics of classic fighting games, the player needs to have good mechanics to perform combos and fight the evil. It has clean cut actions, multiple playable characters and even a battle chess mini-game.

name: An Action Roguelite For When You Have 20 Minutes to Spare
description: An Action Roguelite For When You Have 20 Minutes to Spare because you gotta leave soon and there's no game you can squeeze in so you play this. Be careful not to lose track of time and miss your appointments.

name: Meow Town
description: MeowTown is a simulation game with wilderness puzzles and exploration. Players take on the role of human volunteers who come to MeowTown to help build a colony of dry cats, learn about human civilization, and find the dry cat they met when they were young ......

name: Clueless Crosswords
description: Are you smart enough to be completely clueless...?

name: Exodus
description: Exodus is a game that blends a god-game and a puzzle game, themed around the "Book of Exodus". As the hand of God, manipulate water, land, and other elements to solve intricate puzzles and lead the Hebrews out of Egypt.

name: Dirty Streamer Puzzle
description: Live streaming sometimes turn even the quietest girls into dirty ones!

name: Edegard: Puqq
description: Edegard: Puqq is an attention mining game where you need to craft and eat materials to stay alive. The decisions what you will take with you may become harder as more items are gathered in your cart. The space is limited, but the loot is endless.

name: Find!
description: You play as a robber who has decided to rob the local mafiosi and run away with the loot. You have 10 levels to go through, each of which you will have to look for hidden objects.

name: DinoPlanet VR
description: Take a guided tour through your very own dinosaur zoo and see these extraordinary animals at their spectacular scale for the first time using VR headsets!

name: Froguelike
description: Your choices matter in Froguelike where you play as a frog on a mission to eat all the bugs. Level up, choose new tongues and upgrades, become unstoppable and run straight into the swarm! Unlock all frogs, tongues, items and chapters to become the most powerful frog in the pond.

name: Medieval Crafter: Blacksmith
description: Medieval Crafter: Blacksmith is a crafting simulation game where you Physically interact with your tools. Manage the complete process, resource acquisition, mining ore, gather resource to crafting weapons and armors for your customers. Craft items, forge and increase your blacksmith skills!

name: Beat Slayer
description: Put on your headphones, feel the beat, step into the flow and survive. Beat Slayer is all about rhythm and fighting. Pick a crazy weapon like the flamethrowing axe and turn hordes of robots into scrap metal by creating your own symphony of destruction.

name: Hordes of Hunger
description: Hordes of Hunger is a fast-paced action arena slasher with rogue-lite elements set in the dark fantasy setting of Ismer. A land engulfed by the living hunger, the cosmic horror known only as the Beast. You are the unlucky one still living inside the nightmare and the only way out is through it.

name: VICCP 2 Core
description: The Very Important Central Control Panel is back. Keeping the mysterious atmosphere and with even more mysteries. Control the omnipotence remote, experiment, and find many endings. Brainstorming in retro sci-fi style / Puzzle / Quest / Point Click.

name: Sea of Survivors
description: In Sea of Survivors, you can sail in any direction but you can never stop moving. Dodge and destroy hordes of pirates and sea monsters to gain experience, level up and upgrade your weapons and abilities. Discover mysterious curses, and unlock unique treasures as you fight for your survival.

name: Tales & Tactics
description: Roguelike Squad-based Autobattler in a Tabletop RPG setting. Draft your army, carefully equip and position your units, make important choices, and meet a colorful cast of characters as you make ready for the Grand Tournament.

name: Tiny Tied
description: A tiny journey where every action has consequences.

name: Phantom Flail
description: Dark Fantasy action roguelike with tons of different weapons, enemies, and spells. Battle through a diverse set of randomized levels fighting hordes of the undead and unnatural.

name: Jewel Match Aquascapes: Collector's Edition
description: Dive into a wondrous Match-3 undersea world and let the cares of life drift away! Make matches across sprawling coral reef levels, and collect sparkling treasures to restore magnificent maritime mansions to their erstwhile splendor.

name: Survival & Horror: Mortanis Prisoners
description: Mortanis Prisoners - A survival horror game set in a Third Reich concentration camp where the camp's leadership, upon discovering a planned rebellion, orders the execution of all accomplices. Two main protagonists encounter an even more terrifying fate. Will they be able to escape the nightmare?

name: Father
description: An RPG which chooses between being a cutesy, wholesome dream-like adventure... or a dreadful, fear-inducing nightmare.

name: Marble Race Creator
description: Design your own tracks and create breathtaking races of marble balls using this physics based sandbox.

name: ReThink | Evolved 5
description: ReThink | Evolved 5 is a Puzzle Game in a peaceful futuristic setting, that features a variety of Puzzles that utilize Lasers and the behavior of light and it's colors to create challenging problems to solve.

name: Jojoy!: Ecorpy Islands
description: Jojoy!: Ecorpy Islands is a casual cute 3D platformer where a little girl is traveling across tropicals islands to purify all the scattered dark matter. Find treasures, bonk enemies, jump everywhere, solve puzzles, and more!

name: Raids Inc.
description: I fused different RPG mechanics trying to bring something fresh to the gaming community. Сlimb the bizarre towers! Fight with fascinating monsters! Loot! Gain experience! Upgrade your abilities and skills!

name: Golf vs. Zombies
description: Golf VS Zombies is an arcade golf simulator with RPG elements which combines golfing precision with action-packed combat against the undead. Grab your clubs and get in your golf cart, for in this zombie apocalypse, there is only golf.

name: Great Again
description: A survival roguelike game where you avoid and kill zombies, save serum, and rescue hostages with your dogs Abbey and Amy.

name: You Have No Time
description: You Have No Time is a fast-paced 3D puzzle game that puts players in control of time itself. In this game, players have the power to slow down time, giving them a chance to outsmart enemies, avoid traps, and save their allies. Players only have 30 seconds to solve each puzzle before time runs out.

name: Terror of the Seven Seas
description: Live a life as a mighty captain in a vast Seven Seas spanning Open World. Gather your crew, ready your ship and enter a world of swashbuckling and piracy. Whether to conquer the world for your king and glory, amass wealth beyond measure as a trader or become the very Terror of the Seven Seas itself!

name: Captain Pawsome
description: Humanity destroyed the climate and left for Mars. Cats are now running the World. Catch rare fishes and find hidden treasures. Clean the environment and craft with recycled resources. Rebuild your Town and Run your own Post-Apo Oceanarium!

name: The Mangust
description: The Mangust is a high octane action platformer. You play as the Mangust, a lone drifter with a loose grip on reality. Blitz through enemies with an arsenal of customizable guns and special abilities. Explore different environments, defeat iconic bosses, and stop the plans of the Evil Dr. Cassowary.

name: Pitchfork Battles
description: Gain control over resources, build powerful kingdoms and strengthen the army to protect your people from enemies. Send your heroes into battle and lead your army to victory, become a great ruler who will be remembered forever.

name: Rainbow Warhead
description: "Rainbow Warhead" is a Q version of the shooting competition and RPG training set in one of the battle games! PVP,PVE and other modes, competition, PK! Real-time match, and friends team up to the top of the strongest king! Play is the pleasure of shooting, come to open your road to the king!

name: Bellhop
description: Bellhop is a casual hotel management game. Meet clients' demands and basic needs to earn tips. Use your savings to upgrade and improve your tools.

name: Shutter
description: In Shutter you play as Keith, a new employee that has arrived at the mysterious research center L.I.E. (Learn, Investigate and Exploit). Explore and solve puzzles with a camera that modifies objects using perspective. All in a space-age inspired setting.

name: Tagger Mascot
description: In a residential area with dusk setting, a life-or-death game of tag begins！

name: Moonless
description: Moonless is a challenging side-scrolling platformer in the style of classic arcade games of the 1980s, where you control a helpless astronaut who has been left stranded on the moon, and now has to face an invading alien force to earn a chance to go home.

name: Wall Shooter
description: Wall Shooter is an immersive puzzle shooter game for VR where you will solve puzzles, shoot accurately, and save the universe from an approaching wall made of colorful bricks. (Yes, sometimes universal evil takes unusual forms.)Combine colors, use bonuses, and discover secrets on each level!

name: Quadrium
description: Quadrium is a fiddly match-3 game. Clear the board by dropping the tiles off the edges. Various bonuses like boxes, glass, fog, static tiles and portals add variety to the gameplay. Juicy and soft graphics, relaxing music and no time limit allow you to enjoy the innovative gameplay.

name: AfroPenguin & The Forbidden Ramen
description: "AfroPenguin & The Forbidden Ramen" is a challenging argentinian 2D adventure game which pays homage to those Nintendo titles that made us smile as a kid (and why not, as adults).

name: Stigmata of Sacrilege
description: Upon her initiation into the Sisters of Exorcism, Sophie is blessed with a sign from the Lord that she is fated to become the next saint. Now, she must overcome her trials for sainthood and seek blessings from various holy sites.

name: The Rebirth of Kingdom Lo
description: This game is a conversational RPG, depicting the story of the kemono prince and six princesses, in order to revive the kingdom and reproduce their offspring.

name: 1001 Jigsaw: Cute Cats 5
description: Soapy cats do not get tired of hilarity! And the brain relentlessly demands a workout - the game "1001 Jigsaw: Cute Cats 5" will help in this!

name: Megafortress Collection
description: Take to the skies for gripping air-assault missions with the Megafortress Collection. This complete package includes the original 1991 DOS classic Megafortress, the Operation Sledgehammer and Operation Skymaster expansions, and the Mission Editor for Operation Skymaster.

name: Spiral Smash
description: Spiral Smash is a very interesting game. Players need to control a ball to continuously fall and destroy obstacles.

name: Foxblade
description: Enter a war-torn land full of dangers, find powerful weapons and artifacts, make friends and complete their quests, make enemies and hack and slash your way through them, discover the mysteries of the land and earn your place in the world.

name: Twilight Oracle
