description: Journey to a strange world in search of the fabled Oracle in this fantasy comedy point & click adventure. Play as Leo, a struggling student with the ability to breathe underwater, and explore a desert island and the depths of an alien ocean to uncover your school's dark past.

name: The Song of the Nightrider
description: Unravel the secrets of evil love with sword and song. Become a sound witch and break the Nightrider's curse!

name: Skies Above the Great War
description: Skies Above the Great War is a hybrid of action and grand strategy sandbox game set on the Western Front during the First World War. Manage your air forces or take control of any plane yourself in real time.

name: Magical Town
description: Use your spells to kill the creatures that besiege the town. Improve your spells with the gold you earn. As time passes, the creatures will also become stronger. You must become strong enough to defeat the boss creature before it arrives.

name: Sheepdogs
description: A casual single-player game where you are the shepherd and your sheepdogs follow your every command. Your goal: Get those sheep into the pen!

name: Ancient Mind
description: Explore a region of mystery and danger in Ancient Mind, a modern take on the classic zelda-like top-down action adventure. Explore dungeons, fight monsters, solve puzzles, and discover the truth about ancient legends.

name: Awareness
description: Horror adventure game with an emphasis on the story, in which, by interacting with the environment and characters, you have to help the doll-boy stop the terrible events that he himself is to blame.

name: Sexy Cyberpunk Puzzle
description: Dark cyber future is not so gloomy in the company of a pretty girl!

name: Winning Hearts: Wrestling Otome
description: Turn around a wrestling promotion and fall in love along the way!

name: 3 Last Chances
description: 3 Last Chances is an Action RPG game with challenging combat and progression system that allows to create your own unique playstyle. You get 3 chances to replay a year, complete quests and find just the right method of weakening and overcoming the seemingly unbeatable final boss.

name: Crab God
description: Crab God is an atmospheric underwater god game where you must restore the environment to sustain your children. Build beautiful coral reefs, grow your crabby religion, and explore a hostile yet beautiful ocean world. Can you protect your children and raise the next generation of ocean guardians?

name: Blow Away
description: Blow Away is a casual action game with unique elements of "manual attack," "knockdown" and "blow away "in addition to the Rogue-lite elements. You can also defeat enemies, develop characters, and learn powerful auto-activated skills. Use them to defeat the enemy's large army and powerful boss.

name: Quack Invasion
description: Pilot mechs as you slaughter hordes of a diverse cast of alien ducks. Build your arsenal from a variety of mechs, weapons and items to survive in ever-changing scenarios.

name: Grimwalker
description: Face off against hell forces in shooter "Grimwalker". Engage in thrilling combat with a variety of weapons and use your demon form to become even more powerful. Explore a world filled with secrets while managing your resources to survive.

name: Virvius
description: Scour through the fallen foundry, obscuring enemies and creatures whilst plundering to your death, get ripped apart or circumvent through harsh environments and traps. Let the gun do the talking, so sit back, relax and blow everything to pieces.

name: Protolife: Other Side
description: Reverse Tower Defense game where you control waves of creatures against towers. Protolife game spin-off.

name: King Datchi
description: Welcome to the world King Datchi, a 2D turn-based RPG where your actions weigh life and death as you train and battle to win the King Datchi Tournament. Solve puzzles, conquer gyms, and outsmart trainers to become King Datchi. Are you up for the challenge? The fate of your Datchi is in your hands!

name: The Jeffy Game
description: The Jeffy Game is an outrageously fun 2D platformer where you play as Jeffy and embark on the adventure of a lifetime! Defeat the evil green beans, collect the cereal boxes, and discover hidden surprises!

name: Ninja Sneaking VS
description: Asymmetrical versus action game. The game is divided into two sides: the intruder side and the pursuer side. The intruder player aims for the goal at the right end of the screen in each stage. The pursuer player sets traps & controls enemy ninjas to prevent players from interfering.

name: Arisen Force: Vonimir
description: "Arisen Force: Vonimir" is an A-RPG game featuring exquisite high-definition pixels, it combines the engaging RPG adventure storyline with the 2.5D combat experience.We create a magnificent Middle-Earth world, for players exploration and adventure, recruit teammates, collect and develop business, challenge enemies, reveal the secrets of the world, guide the future, forge your own legends .

name: Dead of Day
description: Survive the zombie apocalypse, in this retro styled old school dungeon crawler. Go out into the world, collect resources, meet and rescue other survivors, uncover the story of Dead of Day.

name: Darkzan Arena
description: Challenge the greatest legends and creatures in this epic coliseum! Collect your treasures and upgrade your gears until you become number one in the entire multiverse. The game is an Arcade based on waves of enemies, each enemy has a unique behavior and a list of specific rewards.

name: Malware Derby
description: Arcade car combat game set in virtual world where you play as virus

name: Horror Cartridge Collection
description: A collection of retro styled games bundled together, experience many forms of horror in a wide array of styles whilst uncovering the mysteries of the old mall that holds them all.

name: DeckEleven's Railroads 2
description: DeckEleven's Railroads 2 is a fun and addictive railroads building game. Like a true Tycoon, you are in charge of everything! Design and build the perfect railways network.

name: Verisim Skies
description: Verisim Skies is a Vertical Shoot 'Em Up with an emphasis on story and cinematic action. Go forth, Champion. Find your purpose. Fulfill your destiny. Accept your fate.

name: SGS Battle For: Stalingrad
description: The terrible "rat fights" (Ratenkrieg) fought out in the urban area of Stalingrad end of 1942, on a battalion scale and two days per turn scales. Relive one of the fiercest and deadliest battles in history, a ‘Hell in a Small Place’.

name: Bud Spencer & Terence Hill: Slaps and Beans 2
description: The second chapter of the official video game of Bud Spencer and Terence Hill

name: Hertz
description: Launch into a fierce roguelite action in this top-down twin-stick shooter with bombs! In a robotic world, control Lizzy and their team of unlockable beasty bots in a quest for upgrades. But beware, needed resources are guarded by swarms of Steel Sentinels. Survive them to craft synergistic builds.

name: Fool's Gold
description: Fool’s Gold is a chaotic, couch co-op adventure-themed heist! Two bumbling explorers will work together to traverse ancient tombs and temples, grabbing as much treasure as they can, while contending with deadly traps, perilous enemies, and environmental puzzles.

name: Crabling
description: Brutally hard rage-platformer about a young crab on its revenge trip to the moon. Master your Crabling Hook and swing from rock bottom to the places where no crab has ever been.

name: The Drone Zone
description: Action survival shooter with an open map, upgrades, lots of weapons and many enemy types.

name: The Alchemist of Nafiljar
description: You wanted to be an Alchemist and after several years studying you finally have your own business. Will you be able to stand out and become the real Alchemist? Mix ingredients, sell potions and find out the essences to grow your reputation in this game of deductions where each game is unique.

name: RFA Station
description: A space shooter in which you must defeat alien robots.

name: Nanovoid
description: In Nanovoid, the pursuit of immortality has led to the awakening of a prime evil that threatens everything. With the universe turned against us, protect the human race and face off against deadly enemies in this high-stakes space shooter. Can you save humanity from annihilation in a deathless world?

name: Brie Parmesan Mysteries
description: Brie Parmesan, master detective is a stealthy rat navigating the criminal underworld of Chicatgo in search of cheese and collecting evidence to solve cases and bring the Cat Meofia to justice.

name: Witchcraft: Candy Hunt
description: Witchcraft: Candy Hunt is an old-school shooter game with charming pixel art graphics that will take you on a Halloween adventure. Fly on a broomstick and battle your way through three exciting levels, each one featuring unique spooky creatures such as pumpkin monsters, evil crows and ghosts.

name: Blade of the Netherworld
description: You, who has signed a contract with the Netherworld, will find and kill these dangerous monsters. As the Blade of the Netherworld, you will experience a series of thrilling battles and challenges to keep the balance between the living and the dead.

name: A Call From Under the House
description: A Lovecraftian detective game using point-and-click style gameplay where the player must investigate a house suspected of cultish activity.

name: Colossus: Eternal Blight
description: Traverse a vast world to find Lucian's brother. Explore, uncover secrets, and utilize Lucian's abilities to fight corrupted creatures and purify the land. Embark on a journey filled with danger, mystery, and magic in this epic action-adventure game.

name: Voidless
description: Voidless is a space survival sandbox set in a realistic scale solar system. In first or third person, players can explore planets and asteroids, collect resources, and craft items. As they progress, they can build bases and ships, all with realistic physics-based flight and combat.

name: Second Sun
description: Second sun is a RPG High-octane FPS which uses a mix of open maps with procedurally generated dungeons, points of interest, and loot to make every encounter exciting! Use your inhuman abilities to save the Empire from being destroyed and prevent the world from being taken over by evil.

name: The Black Within
description: The Black Within is a single-player first-person psychological horror. When selling her soul for fame and fortune, Laila Rose faces the consequences of her actions. A tale of Greed, fear, and change.

name: Garden of Roses: Summerset
description: A branching visual novel set in a world where monster girls walk among us. Take the role of Will Getz, a young man with a score to settle after 15 long years of being away from home. Unravel the mysteries and intrigue that have been awaiting your return, after all this time.

name: Devil Dumper Doris
description: Conquer a castle of demons!

name: Nobody Paradox
description: Nobody Paradox is a single player, Sci-fi themed FPS set in the dark environment of a spaceship, filled with explosions, shooting, survival and many challenges.

name: Backgaminion
description: Backgaminion is an atmospheric board game with deck building as its essential element. You experience dungeon crawling in a mystic fantasy world and turn your cards into powerful minions and magic effects on the board.

name: Fallen Survivors
description: Rogue-lite arena shooter, where you kill monsters by knocking them out of arena. Shoot them, punch them, freeze them, burn them and much more in this unique take on a genre.

name: Imperium: Galactic War Classic
description: Imperium: Galactic War is a free-to-play science-fiction strategy game of galactic warfare, empire building, and untold glory. Three mighty factions struggle for supremacy of a battle-torn universe. Some fight for peace, others for glory and conquest, and others seek only profit, power and chaos.

name: Stellar Empires
description: Multiplayer real-time strategy game where you take control of an Empire, lead it to complete domination by colonizing new planets.

name: Acolyte of the Altar
description: Hunt through the wastelands for colossal Beasts in this roguelike deckbuilder. Beware! Beasts grow stronger during battle, allowing them to consume your creatures or counter your spells. Carve profane Gifts from these behemoths and grow stronger to serve your Patron! But serve them to what end?

name: Fashion Contract
description: Fashion designer Jessica and her model friend Rebecca want to rise in their careers, and they join the fashion show. Both girls can help each other at this event.

name: Wave of Elms
description: Combination of roguelike and strategy in one side view game. Defend yourself against constantly attacking Elms while researching procedural research branches. Destroy the enemy or lose

name: Gezeichnet: Unsere Flucht 1945
description: Gezeichnet: Unsere Flucht 1945 ist ein emotionales, atmosphärisches Survival-Adventure mit einem Fokus auf Narrative und lebendig gemachter Historie.

name: Hero Planter
description: Get your green thumb ready, because this Roguelite farm simulator is like no other! Each dungeon is unique and unpredictable. Master the art of growing plants and defend them against waves of sneaky pests to become the ultimate Hero Planter.

name: StreetStep: 21st Century Basketball
description: An Action Packed game of 3 on 3 Basketball! Duke it out against your friends in a frantic Basketball Battle!

name: Swarm Survivor
description: A dark and moody top-down shooter. Unlock new weapons and upgrades by completing achievements, making each run different. Will you be able to escape the swarm?

name: Waterfall Prisoner
description: Can you escape from Waterfall Tower? A point and click puzzle game made in the vein of old-school graphic adventure classics.

name: Neon Nexus
description: Neon Nexus is a procedurally generated, sci-fi roguelike. Navigate the world, fight enemies, and work your way to the extraction zone. Try and get out alive!

name: Litchi Town
description: The antique style business simulation game Litchi Town is inspired by the production team's rural life experience. Communicate with the neighbors in the ancient town, grow fruits and vegetables, breed animals, build houses, build your own farm.

name: Poveglia: The Island of Non Return
description: Visit one of the darkest places in Italy where hundreds of souls were forgotten in time. After an acclaimed career as a private investigator, detective William Miller takes on one last case; the disappearance of the Family Pierangelli, which has remained in mystery for over thirty years.

name: Montaro 2
description: Montaro, master of stealth, sneakily infiltrating a convenience store with nobody being none the wiser. A stealth puzzle game where you manipulate objects and NPCs to complete objectives, "stealing pantsu".

name: No Creeps Were Harmed TD
description: Employ lethal turrets, traps, and gadgets to defend against an onslaught of evolving creeps! Step into a twisted, hyper 3D, mind bending realm. Upgrade and adapt your defenses. Become a master maze crafter. Collect bizarre artifacts. Rush creeps for lucrative rewards, and succumb to greed!

name: Baphomet: Eternal Flame
description: Prepare to unleash your inner demon and dominate the mortal realm as the Demon Lord Baphomet! Wreak havoc with a powerful array of demonic spells and abilities to crush cities, towns, and villages, and build your demonic empire to reign supreme over all those who oppose you.

name: Wipe Girls 0
description: By wiping the black screen on the pictures, spend wonderful days with four unique girls each with their own flavor~

name: Sky
description: Sky is a new way of looking at urban planning strategies. Change voxel landscapes at your discretion, develop technologies, build environmentally friendly cities of the future, and withstand any blows from the elements.

name: Stack
description: Stack is a VR multiplayer game about dashing through post-apocalyptic environments and timing disc bounces to eliminate your opponents.

name: Special Squad vs. Zombies
description: A strange toxin has entered the city and almost all people in the city were transformed into the zombies. The zombies are very ferocious and they can destroy everything that prevents them. There is only one change to save the city, it is the Special Squad.

name: Perfect Hand of Nostalpix
description: Perfect Hand of Nostalpix is a remaster of the 1989 digital card game classic. Defeat your foes with a deck you tweaked to perfection by collecting, upgrading and evolving each card, in this blast from the past enhanced with new mechanics!

name: BlockRunner: The BlockSide
description: Get through levels and fight some crazy bosses or just try to beat your high score in endless mode in this bullet hell type of a game! Stuff may happen or change when its least expected!

name: Rolling Fur: A Cat Puzzle Adventure
description: This is the story of a cube-shaped cat, rolling around, face planting and solving puzzles. Help the cat find the way back home.

name: Super Cat Simulator
description: Unwind and indulge in the world of Super Cat Simulator - an open-world cat game with lo-fi vibes. Discover secrets, collect charming items, and unlock new abilities. With 40+ lo-fi chilled beats, relax and enjoy the immersive cat simulation experience. Add to your wishlist MEOW!

name: Remore: Infested Kingdom
description: A challenging turn-based tactical RPG that transports you into a medieval apocalyptic infestation. Your survivors are fragile, and every step you take could be your last.

name: Burning Skies Arcade
description: You are the last hope for humanity against the evil General Bloodmester and his army of war machines. With fast-paced action and challenging levels, this free-to-play retro-style shoot 'em up game will take you back to the days of quarter-eating arcade machines.

name: Dynasthir
description: Delve into the obscure world of Dynasthir, where the risk of being undone is ever present. Push forward and persist & you may just live to tell your tale. The world is dying, will you persist?

name: Hell: Distant Lights
description: Hell: Distant Lights is a low poly puzzle game with shooter elements and a little bit of horror.

name: Hentai Cubes
description: Relaxing puzzle game featuring 10 beautiful girls, one extra level with random kinky stuff and 120 images to unlock.

name: The Gap
description: The Gap is a short first-person horror experience taking place in a ghostly abandoned house on a lonely street corner.

name: Edelweiss
description: "Edelweiss" is a Japanese-inspired horror RPG that follows the journey of Ayla and her friend lost in a dense forest with no cellphone signal. In search of assistance, Ayla with her friends found to an abandoned orphanage, setting the stage for a spine-chilling horror narrative.

name: Loop
description: Put your puzzle-solving skills to the test with Loop, the addictively fun game. Move stones around a grid system to their correct positions and challenge yourself with exciting gameplay!

name: Russian Fishing 4: Norwegian Sea
description: Explore the sea and find fish with a powerful marine boat and a fish finder. Use a variety of tackle and bait to achieve the best result. Get new fishing experience and compete with other players.

name: Tile Lands
description: Tile Lands is a minimalist, City Building strategy game about managing and optimising buildings using a limited deck of tiles.

name: Onchu
description: Assume the role of Onchu, a druid boy stranded on an island corrupted by dark magic. Learn new magic and abilities in this 2D Metroidvania and explore a stunning sidescrolling world to save the island from destruction.

name: L'affaire est Dans le Sac
description: In an investigation where the thieves are not necessarily the ones you think they are, follow the clues, question the suspects, and get to the truth by avoiding false leads. But beware, some people are not ready to give up so easily.

name: Bone N Soul
description: Bone N Soul is a two player metroidvania. Cast spells and bombard your enemies in ranged combat or become more personal and possess your enemies to advance through a place where desire reigns.

name: Hero's Land
description: Hero’s Land is an open-world, multi-player survival game. In here, you can unlock distinctive heroes as you progress your exploration, or you can train on-map pets to be your combat partners. Don’t forget that you can make friends, put together a team, and build a home of your own team. Stay alive!

name: Otoko Cross: Pretty Boys Breakup!
description: Meet a diverse cast of 9 cute crossdressing characters as they challenge you in brick-breaking arcade action! Score points to unlock new outfits for your companions in this this celebration of Japanese "otokonoko" style and sub-culture.

name: Where is Agnes?
description: "Where is Agnes?" It's a mix of a point & click game with a simple combat system and visual novel with puzzles. Agnes was in an unknown place. Where is she? Explore the dark world, communicate with its unusual inhabitants, solve secrets.

name: Tower Tales
description: Tower Tales is a new tower defense game that takes you on a journey through unique worlds. Build and upgrade towers strategically to stop incoming hordes of enemies. Collect resources, choose biomes, and upgrade your towers to defend against the forces of evil. Start playing now and join the action!

name: Inu : Loas'Fate
description: Play as Inu and explore the bayou and voodoo culture. Strengthen the bond between Vilokan and our world by guiding creatures through trials. Be strategic, manage mana, summon creatures, cast spells and upgrade creatures in this strategy/tower offense game.

name: SuperPantsu Tentikun
description: A lewd game of tentacle pleasures.

name: Martian Conquer
description: Jump in the cockpit and combate the human fleet. MC is a mix of RTS and classic space shooter game.

name: Follow Me
description: A great pixel adventure in a vast, coluorful world. Aren't you curious what's behind the door? You wouldn't know until you look there. Follow the white rabbit. Exploration, interaction, friends, enemies and even some bosses to defeat. All this in a beautiful pixel art 2D platformer.

name: Itareri Zukuseri
description: Sin descripción

name: Ninja Golf 2
description: A Golf game, Vampire Survivors like, with lot of Shmup inside

name: Epidemic
description: Epidemic is a first-person, survival horror adventure with puzzles and gameplay heavily inspired by Classic Horror. It will be an episodic series.

name: OneWay.exe
description:
oneway.exe is a first-person, single player horror game, with a heavy focus on story and internet culture. Explore, survive and solve puzzles to find out what happened to UNTITLED.EXE, its developers, and understand why you're in the middle of it.

Face the internet horrors that haunt your past. The one's you've never heard of. They don't exist.

name: Hell Evolution: Devil Girls Raising
description: This is a game where you can nurture and command the devil girls to fight and defeat the Sexy Seven Deadly Sins!

name: Coralina: A Memory Tale
description: A oneiric plot about two girls unraveling the mysteries of Limbo, a land of alchemists, and its other layers: Hell and Purgatory. The second chapter of "Coralina", an indie and retro game, with a charming and original look.

name: Survival & Horror: Undead Space
description: The events of the game take place in the future, on research complexes located on Mars. Take on the role of the hero who finds himself alone surrounded by the undead. Find a way to escape and immerse yourself in the atmosphere of cosmic horror. Prepare to explore the Undead Space.

name: Obelisk
description: Obelisk is a turn-based tower defence game in which you take on the role of space astronaut Allen as he fights monsters and guards the Energy Obelisk on this planet.

name: Slime Slayer
description: Slime Slayer is a 3rd person action roguelite focused on the destruction of ALL SLIMES! Craft unique spells and character builds with mechanically and functionally distinct elements and modifier runes to conquer a slime-infested forest.

name: Nuclear Winter
description: After years of living underground in the safe zone you return to what is left of a once-thriving city after a nuclear war. Learn to avoid the radiation, scavenge for resources, craft tools and build shelter in this first person dystopia simulator.

name: Find You
description: Find You is a puzzle adventure where you will have to help Mimi & Mimo to find each other again after being separated into opposite worlds.

name: Ritual
description: Ritual is a first-person psychological horror game. Immerse yourself in this sinister experience of terror, where everything familiar becomes strange to you, find the necessary elements to complete the ritual and solve the mystery.

name: Earth Defender
description: Play as one of the last surviving humans on a post-apocalyptic Earth, where resources are scarce and danger lurks around every corner. As you scavenge for supplies, fend off vicious enemies, and build a small colony, you must use your wits and combat skills to survive in this harsh new world.

name: Castle War
description: In this real time strategy game, defeat your friends by destroying their castle. The last player with their castle still standing wins! Players must manage their economy, build their base and defenses, while producing and upgrading their units.

name: CircuiTree
description: CircuiTree is a rhythm-based circuitry building game where your goal is to keep the mother tree alive by building and repairing circuits before they cause irreparable damage. CircuiTree was made by Cody Bock (Neonalig) in 48 hours between 2020/04/18 to 2020/04/20 as part of Ludum Dare 46 for the theme 'Keep it Alive'.

name: Touhou Ki Kai Record
description: A joke doujin game which crosses Touhou characters with Kiki Kaikai gameplay. It was made in Action Editor 4 and only features a single stage.

name: Lucky Kaikai
description: A doujin game which crosses Lucky Star characters with Kiki Kaikai gameplay. This is Chick Theater's first released game.

name: Don't Freeze
description:
The spiritual… predecessor… to that one game about going hungry.
Can you escape the forest before you go mad?
Hey, I think this place looks familiar…

name: Tenchi Shinden
description: Jump into this platformer with a unique, dimensional, twist. Play as a ninja with the power of Tenchi.

name: Green Five
description:
Green Five is a surreal sci-fi adventure game in the style of Prince of Persia and Out of This World. You guide R76384EJ, a computer-generated lifeform who must fight through an artificial universe, fraught with many challenges. If he succeeds, he can live a peaceful life in a safe colony with Q94578WK, the digital girl of his dreams. If he fails, both of them will be deleted.

Developed in Amiga AMOS, the game was initially released as shareware in 1994, with a full version planned. However, the death of the Amiga meant that the game when unreleased. However, in 2005, the developer Mark Judge released the full version of the game for free.

name: DreamStream
description: A hybrid shooter/puzzle game developed by Mark Judge in 1995. The game never saw an official release due to the demise of the Amiga, but in 2005 Judge released the game online as freeware.

name: Homesickened
description:
A short story about rational fears in 4-color CGA.

You can't go home again. Except that you can. But you don't really want to. And then you do, anyway.

name: Neo Berlin 2087
description: A unique, Third- and First-Person Action Role-Playing Game; a deep, cinematic Detective Thriller that takes place in a dark future vision of Berlin. Solve a far-reaching conspiracy on an emotional Cyberpunk Journey about Justice, Friendship, Love, Guilt, Sacrifice and Betrayal.

name: The Geometric Golfer
description: The Geometric Golfer is an educational game about geometry that is loosely based on the sport of golf.

name: Guerrière Lyewärd
description: After World War III, humans have finally achieved world peace - or so they thought. Malevolent aliens have infected the human organism in a most treacherous way possible, turning young and pretty women into rampaging, violent nymphomaniacs. Only one person can stop the insanity - the attractive secret agent with the codename Lyewärd. Guerrière Lyewärd is a side-scrolling beat-em-up. The gameplay is very simple: the player moves the protagonist through strictly linear stages from left to right, each containing a few types of female enemies that attack the heroine from both sides. The secret agent can punch, kick, and jump. Power-ups such as health-restoring hearts and invincibility appear at set points during the stages, floating in the air. Each stage culminates with a boss battle against a powerful female enemy; defeating the boss leads to a lesbian sex scene.

name: Hlina
description:
A dream in a world of plasticine.

hlina is an adventure game released as a part of the 39th edition of the indie virtual zine Indiepocalypse. It will be released as a standalone game in May 2023.

name: Neko Miko Onryou Toubatsu Emaki
description: In this side-scrolling shooter with six stages, choose three out of six different cats and utilize their unique abilities to fight back against the vengeful yokai!

name: Idle Anomaly: Alien Control
description:
Build a research station around the mysterious Obelisk space and control all its secrets in this idle clicker explore game!

A group of space researchers recently came across a strange structure in the Arctic. It looks like an alien roller coaster or alien starship from the UFO theme park. This Obelisk was clearly made by an unknown power.
In the process of building explorer home base, something strange gait of a zombie appears in the territory. But it isn't a zombie, it is an alien!
They will try to attack and to interfere with the Obelisk research and building of your clicker Empire!

name: Dream 64
description: Dream 64 is a cancelled Nintendo 64 game developed by Rare that was later reworked into the game Banjo-Kazooie.

name: You Will Fall
description: You're standing on the roof of a building staring at the thin tightrope stretched taught over the wide expanse. Your one goal is to make it across. Only problem is, you will fall. It is inevitable. Good thing you have this voice inside your head to constantly remind you of your fate.

name: Angry Birds Google+
description: A port of Angry Birds Chrome that was playable on Google+ which featured the episodes Poached Eggs, Chrome Dimension and a unique one to the port called Teamwork.

name: The Gray Wolf and The Little Lamb
description: Once upon a time there lived the grey wolf and the little lamb. One was infamously cruel while the other had a heart of gold. They both egotistically believed they could teach one another a life lesson. But maybe they could become friends in the end?

name: The Lonely League
description: The Lonely League is a comic book style superhero tactical fangame RPG with Superman, Batman, Venom and John Lennon. It alternates between comic book cutscenes and tactical battles inspired by games like Shining Force and Final Fantasy Tactics. Battles are challenging and deeply tactical, and there are always multiple paths to victory, which often include not only attacking but also interacting with map objects and recruiting temporary characters. The story develops from common errands of an ordinary guy, slowly escalating to an epic journey with psychological and political undertones.

name: Mine The Diamond
description: Set in the world of Tobuscus, Mine The Diamond is an 'Endless Runner,' or as we like to call it, an 'Endless Driller.' You are tasked with drilling through the planet to collect diamonds, all the while delaying your inevitable death via obstacles such as murderous penguins, dinosaur bones, blowfish and radioactive waste!

name: Bounce Boing Voyage
description: Bounce Boing Voyage is an 3D Platformer game released in 2008 via the N-Gage service.

name: Serial Experiments Lain Bootleg
description: Serial Experiments Lain Bootleg is the third and final soundtrack for the Serial Experiments Lain anime. A CD-ROM included with the soundtrack features a dress-up game, a shooting gallery game, wallpapers, and screensavers.

name: Untitled Kirby Game
description: One of the three different Kirby games in development for the Nintendo GameCube which ended up cancelled. This one is was a 3D action-platformer.

name: Untitled Kirby Game
description: One of the three cancelled Kirby games for the Nintendo GameCube. This one was a 2D platformer with 2D graphics.

name: Raios Funde
description:
Raios Funde, a word guessing game that follows a scary aesthetic, its differential is having a connection to Twitch, in which the chat actively participates with its player.
The game has the mechanic for the player to guess the word in the chat or to create the word for his chat to guess.
Thus having multiple tools to entertain the gameplay such as: time, chances and word hints.

name: The Sorrowvirus
description: On the verge of death of a life unlived, Wyatt Heyll was given The Sorrowvirus by his parents, a substance that suspends the human soul in Purgatory after death; allowing Purgatory's mysterious properties to heal them. As he ebbs, Wyatt's only desire is to be free, forever.

name: Race Time!
description: Sin descripción

name: Racing Empires
description: Are you an adrenaline junky? Check out Racing Empires for the perfect mix of racing, strategy building and amazing graphics! Build your city and establish the ultimate drag racing empire! Design your own track, trick out your cars, drift hard and drive even faster to become king of the streets!

name: Sheep in Love
description: Sheep in Love is a unique puzzle game with addictive gameplay. It's easy to pick-up and learn, but it will give your brain a workout as you advance to the more difficult levels. Guide your hero to his love by sliding the tiles!

name: Crows Coming
description: Sin descripción

name: QuestBall
description:
Fast-paced sports game mixed with an action RPG.
This is the story of QuestBall, an ancient sport lost to the mists of time...Legendary warriors of Ancient Britain & Ireland compete against each other in the ultimate game of fantasy tennis! Your quest takes you on a journey around the British Isles, competing against royalty, outlaws, giants and gods.

name: Microsoft Minesweeper
description: A remake of the original Microsoft Minesweeper bundled in Windows Vista and Windows 7.

name: Girl's Blossom Project: Unbelievable Real Love
description:
BanG Dream! Girls Band Project 2022 April's Fools game.

Uehara Himari is a normal high school girl attending Garupa Private Academy.
At this academy, there is a cherry blossom tree which blooms once every ten years.
They say that if you wish for happiness together with someone special
to you under that tree, your wish will surely come true.

Himari searches for her destined partner at this academy.

name: Doctor Who: An Unlikely Heist
description: Doctor Who: An Unlikely Heist is a puzzle adventure video game developed and published by Tilting Point through Apple Arcade for iOS, iPadOS, macOS, and tvOS.

name: A Phone Found in Tall Grass
description:
a phone found in tall grass is an experimental visual novel made in one month. There are no choices and should take between ten and twenty minutes to read.

It tells the story of an apocalypse and three aimless 20-something adults stuck in the middle, via tweets. Read the latest news! Shitpost while hurtling towards oblivion! Tell your closest friends how much you love them!

name: Lost Alone Ultimate
description: Lost Alone Ultimate is a first-person psychological horror game designed to convey anxiety, distress, and terror. You will have to explore three different houses, avoid staying in the dark, and face moments of fear that will not give you respite.

name: Wizardry: Boukyaku no Isan
description:
This is a sequel to "Wizardry: Seimei no Kusabi", released in November 2009.

There are three dungeons available, and the game added quality-of-life features to make it more user-friendly such as save points and fast travel.

Existing characters from the previous game have been removed, and players can create their own characters and form an original party from the beginning.

The game features various systems designed to enhance the fun of dungeon exploration, such as a real-time dungeon that uses the touch pen to solve various gimmicks, a "FAST mode" that cuts attack and spell effects and speeds up messages, a "cooperative attack" that can be activated by combining spells and active skills used during a turn, encounter monsters and adventure records, and a manual to check "achievements."

"Wizardry" is an RPG born in 1981 and is considered the originator of computer RPGs and a globally popular work. This game is a 3D dungeon RPG where players can enjoy labyrinth exploration by delving into deep dungeons. Please enjoy the adventure that follows the world view and system that are characteristic of "Wizardry" while incorporating unique gimmicks that are unique to the Nintendo DS.

name: Furious Farm: Total Reap Out
description:
Furious Farm is the world's first Combine-Harvester racing game. Battle 7 other farmers to see who can reap the biggest portion of the field in this crazy arcade game. Every round 2 farmers get eliminated, and the remaining ones get to upgrade their machine. Will you make it to the end and win the Grain Prix? Alternatively, get up to 3 other players and play against them for a fun and unique party game!

Who said farming should be relaxing?

name: Choro Q
description:
This is a homebrought game, run on Gameboy Color. Original version: Taito - MSX, 1984. Created with GB-Studio 2.0.0 beta5!

The player takes the role of a yellow Volkswagen Beetle (Type 1) Choro-Q, with a surfboard carrier on its roof. The objective of the game is to assemble two more VW Beetles while contending with hostile Choro-Q cars that intend to impede the player's progress. The enemies can be eliminated by jumping on them.

However, the player has a limited amount of life to complete the VW Beetles, which must be assembled in the right order; First, the chassis, then the motor, and lastly the body. When one VW Beetle is completed, it leaves behind a power-up (indicated by a coin-like icon with a dollar sign ($) on it) that grants temporary invincibility, allowing the player to plow through enemy cars.

The level is completed by assembling both VW Beetles. The parts of the Beetles are on the edges of a three-level suspended platform system, and must be pushed off for assembly. The player can jump on the platforms to reach the parts.

The player can lose lives by starting or performing an assembly out of order, crashing into a wall at high speed, falling from too great a height, colliding with an enemy Choro-Q. If the player loses all lives, it results in a game over.

name: Heart Fragment: Book One - Fantasy Fragments
description:
Includes Kay and Clive's routes.

A mysterious figure that appears to you and sets the events of the story into motion is a young man named Kay who always seems to have a smile plastered on his face as he reveals strange secrets to you. His friendly personality makes him easy to open up to despite the odd circumstances.

On the other hand, Clive seems to have a knack for popping up at "just the right moment". A string of coincidental encounters combined with his awkward demeanor cause you to wonder what his intentions really are.

With strong elements of fantasy present in this book, a lot of questions are raised and shocking reveals begin.

name: Goin Up
description: A Flash-based game in which a demon named Mr. Rufus must ascend as far as possible while stomping enemies and avoiding hazards from above. Trade in the skulls of your enemies to purchase upgrades and abilities.

name: Taiheiyou no Arashi: Koukoku no Kouhai Koko ni Ari, 1942 Senkan Yamato Hankou no Kouhou
description: Sin descripción

name: Mega Man Arkanoid
description: This hack changes every single level (excluding the occasional boss fight) in Arkanoid - Doh It Again to a level featuring a character from the classic Mega Man series. Almost every single classic Mega Man game is represented in some way (excluding 11 and some very obscure titles), with main characters, prominent villains, famous enemies and bosses, and loads of robot masters for you to destroy block by block! Play through every level to get a few surprises at the end in the form of cameo appearances by other popular Mega Man characters.

name: Quartz's Quest
description: Sin descripción

name: Paper Mario Eggstraordinary Egg Hunt
description:
Join Mario & Luigi for the annual Easter Egg Hunt in Toad Town and close regions like Koopa Village and Shooting Star Summit!

A Paper Mario Mod made by Miigle and Den / DenNya as a easter present for the Paper Mario Modding Community.

name: Falcão e a Cornopopéia Brasileira
description: Falcão & a Cornopopéia Brasileira is an interactive CD-ROM based around the comedian and singer Falcão, in which you can play six different games, learn about the philosophies of Falcanian ideology, ask the singer questions, learn about the Universal Declaration of the Cuckold's Rights or the Chinese horoscope by Falcão.

name: Matsuro Palette
description: This game is a horror adventure game, released on February 19, 2020 by SleepingMuseum on Googleplay and Appstore.

name: Special Forces Group 3
description: SFG3 is a first person shooter from the Special Forces Group series of games.

name: Wasabi Game
description: This game was released by Studio Wasabi on March 9, 2018 from the Appstore and Googleplay. This game can be played with Studio Wasabi's previous releases "Toraware no Kan," "Ookami Game," and "Eve project You can play "Toraware no Kan", "Ookami Game", and "Eve project". More games will be added in the future.

name: Makoto Wakaido's Case Files: Executioner's Wedge
description: Solve the mystery of decapitated bodies in a point-and-click, pixel art mystery adventure game. Discover clues and solve puzzles to progress.

name: Gakken DS: Otona no Gakushuu Kintaichi Sensei no Nihongo Lesson
description: Japanese language educational software with sections focusing on vocabulary, kanji, communication, cultural, and comprehension. Designed for adult learners for improving Japanese language mastery.

name: Empress's Choice
description: Empress's Choice is a fancy dress-up game, simulates ancient noble life in imperial palaces. To rejuvenate your family, you enter the palace harem bravely, from an anonymous maid to the powerful empress. You can decide what happens next, such as acquainting handsome confidants, cultivating children, and getting promoted by palace competing. Experience the glorious ancient palaces.

name: Mario Kart 8 Deluxe + Booster Course Pass
description: A digital bundle of Mario Kart 8 Deluxe that comes pre-installed with the Booster Course Pass.

name: Mole Manor
description: Mole Manor is a Chinese virtual world game released in 2008 that got updates until 2015.

name: JanKen Battle Arena
description:
JanKen Battle Arena offers players a novel and unique gaming experience that revolves around the old classic Rock, Paper and Scissors mechanic combined with some fighting game element and sprinkled with Social and RPG elements.
Furthermore, challenge fellow JanKen masters around the world into a battle over the internet. Better yet, invite your friends to JanKen Battle Arena to duel and claim the bragging rights to be the better JanKen master.

name: King of Drop
description: It is a game that drops from the top to the bottom platform. The timing of tapping the screen to fall to the next platform is important. You can also skip several. Only you can choose.

name: Shooting Zombie
description:
In 2025, the human race was labeled as the biggest threat to continued progress on Earth by Dr. Evil. In the eyes of the Doctor, humans were no longer fit to wear the crown of masters of this world.To him,it is time for the Zombie the next evolutionary step to becoming masters of the Earth.
The Doctor has amassed enormous zombie armies and has begun unleashing them on the world. The world has plunged into crisis. Our species is facing extinction!
As the world’s governments fall, one after the other, it’s up to you and a handful of survivors to take the planet back for the living.
Hunt Dr.Evil across the globe, using wormholes to jump through space and time, destroying legions of the undead everywhere you go.They have you outnumbered, but you have them outgunned!
The world is waiting for a savior to bring hope back for the human race.
19 different weapons to use in your quest to rid the planet of the walking dead!
6 different characters with 5 different skills to develop and upgrade. Upgrade your character in different ways to make the adventure unique.
3 World maps! 21 classic scenes! 126 levels! A truly global adventure! Sweep away all zombie enemies in the chaos of time and space.
21 different zombie enemies! Pick up your weapon to smash them to atoms!
Thrillingly tough BOSS battles! More challenges and better rewards if you have the skills to conquer them!

name: Icarus
description: Icarus was a cancelled revival of the Kid Icarus series for the Nintendo Wii.

name: Microsoft FreeCell
description: A remake of Microsoft FreeCell included in Windows Vista and Windows 7

name: Nucleares
description: Nuclear Reactor Simulator, operable by a single person with the help of an AI Assistant.

name: Microsoft Hearts
description: A remake of Microsoft Hearts included in Windows Vista and Windows 7.

name: Microsoft Spider Solitaire
description: A remake of Microsoft Spider Solitaire that comes installed with Windows Vista and Windows 7.

name: War Thunder Mobile
description:
War Thunder Mobile is a brand new project that builds upon the success of the widely popular War Thunder game that has tens of millions of players worldwide and has set two Guinness World Records.

Utilizing the same Dagor cross-platform engine as War Thunder and other Gaijin games, War Thunder Mobile delivers first-class graphics and the latest technological advancements on all devices. The development of War Thunder Mobile is led by a new in-house team at Gaijin Entertainment, with guidance from the original War Thunder developers.

New nations and famous vehicles like Abrams tanks and MiG-29 jets will be coming to War Thunder Mobile via regular updates.

name: War Thunder: Sky Guardians
description: The first units for the French naval tree, new and updated graphical effects and data structure optimization along with ejection seats for selected modern jets. Amongst the 43 new as well as updated vehicle models, one can't help but mention the real behemoth - the Char2, the agile AH-6M "Little Bird" helicopter or the first French light cruiser; Duguay-Trouin! In addition to all this, the winter version of the location "Seversk", a new location for fans of avionics - Pyrenees, and as always, many improvements and fixes! Let's welcome the "Sky Guardians" update!

name: Potion Path
description: The king has fallen ill, and now Matteo will have to do something he never thought he would: ask a witch for help.

name: Ooze
description: Ooze is the fifth game of NES version of Action 52.

name: The Gate I
description: Sin descripción

name: Silver Sword
description:
Silver Sword is the sixth game of NES version of Action 52.

The player takes control of a small sprite of a person, and must shoot a number of random enemies in what looks to be a forest of some kind. The music was taken from another game. Also, some enemies are very difficult to dodge, because of the bad turning mechanics.

name: Critical Bypass
description: Critical Bypass is the seventh game of NES version of Action 52.

name: Jupiter Scope
description:
Jupiter Scope is the eighth game of the NES version of Action 52.

You play as what appears to be a space ship, shooting incoming flaming meteors.

name: Alfredo and the Fetucini's
description: Alfred n the Fettuc (Alfredo) is the ninth game of the NES version of Action 52. The full title of the game is listed as 'Alfredo and the Fetucini's' in the manual, but when starting the game from the menu it shows the title 'Alfred n the fettuc'.

name: Operation Full Moon
description: Operation Full Moon is the tenth game of the NES version of Action 52.

name: Dam Busters
description:
Dam Busters is the eleventh game in the NES version of Action 52.

You play as a creature that looks like a beaver, shoot objects that look like tomatoes. Your goal is to go through often linear mazes and exterminate enemies.

name: Thrusters
description:
Thrusters is the twelfth game of the NES version of Action 52.

The gameplay is one of the many space shooter games on Action 52. It is which you play as a spaceship shooting enemies.

name: Haunted Halls of Wentworth
description:
The thirteenth game of the NES version of Action 52.

You play as a female character. Your goal is to walk through the dungeons and destroy ghosts by throwing crosses at them.

name: Chill Out
description:
Chill Out is the fourteenth game in the NES version of Action 52.

Old man winter is at the top and is your goal, but it keeps snowing and he's blowing. You must reach the top before you get snowed under.

name: Sharks
description: A game featured in Action 52. You are a frogman and must collect rare marine creatures and recover lost treasures at the bottom of the sea. You have your stun-gun and can always retreat into your electro magnetic base that that repels sharks and the rest of the enemies. Your diving suit can only survive a few sharks bites and is useless against the deadly jelly fish.

name: Megalonia
description: She comes out of no where with her evil enemies. You must defend against the wave after wave of enemiesvand they will attack until only the Empress Machine "Megalonia" remains.

name: French Baker
description: A game featured in Action 52. You may try to keep the cookie patterns pounding, and the bread rising but it's not as easy as it sounds.

name: Atmos Quake
description: The legions of space pirates are causing solar flares and sending shock waves ro destroy your planet. You must fly in and arrest them all.

name: Meong
description: A game featured in Action 52. Board game of strategy and skill. Try to get pieces from starting line to goal. Watch out for hidden traps. Harder than it sounds.

name: The Gate II
description: Sin descripción

name: Space Dreams
description: A game featured in Action 52. There is a black hole and on the other side all your space dreams. You must get past all of the obstacles to enter the hole and realize your dreams.
